Short Description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

Title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
Short Description: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

Title: District 9
Short Description: In a future Earth in which aliens are isolated in a remote ghetto, a government agent finds himself banished there.

Title: Harvey
Short Description: A whimsical man is thought to be insane due to his insistence that he is best friends with an invisible, humanoid rabbit, but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

Title: Shaun of the Dead
Short Description: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Title: Dallas Buyers Club
Short Description: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

Title: Boyhood
Short Description: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
Short Description: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Title: Wonder
Short Description: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

Title: This Is Spinal Tap
Short Description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

Title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
Short Description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

Title: Do the Right Thing
Short Description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

Title: Marriage Story
Short Description: A stage director and his actor wife struggle through a grueling divorce that pushes them to their personal and creative extremes. Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

Title: Life of Pi
Short Description: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

Title: Toy Story 2
Short Description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

Title: Before Midnight
Short Description: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Short Description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

Title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
Short Description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Title: Carlito's Way
Short Description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

Title: The Ten Commandments
Short Description: Moses, raised as a prince of Egypt in the Pharaoh's household, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people from slavery.

Title: Edward Scissorhands
Short Description: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

Title: Auntie Mame
Short Description: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.

Title: Annie Hall
Short Description: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Title: Being There
Short Description: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

Title: Spartacus
Short Description: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

Title: A Fistful of Dollars
Short Description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Title: Strangers on a Train
Short Description: A psychopath tries to forcibly persuade a tennis star to agree to his theory that two strangers can get away with murder by submitting to his plan to kill the other's most-hated person.

Title: Blood In, Blood Out
Short Description: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

Title: Wings of Desire
Short Description: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

Title: Doctor Zhivago
Short Description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
Short Description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

Title: Sing Street
Short Description: A young lad notices a beautiful girl who begins to occupy his thoughts. While struggling with poverty, personal relationships and life's woes, he starts a band, hoping to catch her attention.

Title: A Streetcar Named Desire
Short Description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

Title: Dancer in the Dark
Short Description: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

Title: Solaris
Short Description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Title: Togo
Short Description: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

Title: The Sacrifice
Short Description: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.

Title: Amour
Short Description: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

Title: A Christmas Story
Short Description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie Parker attempts to convince his parents, teacher, and Santa Claus that a Red Ryder Range 200 Shot BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

Title: The Wrestler
Short Description: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Title: Shoplifters
Short Description: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders are united by loyalty, a penchant for petty theft and playful grifting. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

Title: Captains Courageous
Short Description: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship in the 1920s gets picked up by a New England fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.

Title: Hero
Short Description: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

Title: The Maltese Falcon
Short Description: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

Title: The Manchurian Candidate
Short Description: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

Title: The Wild Bunch
Short Description: An aging group of outlaws in 1913 Texas look for one last big score, selling stolen Army rifles to a rogue Mexican general during that country's revolution, as the traditional American West is disappearing around them.

Title: Notorious
Short Description: The daughter of a convicted German spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of German scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Title: All the President's Men
Short Description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

Title: The Big Country
Short Description: A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

Title: Rope
Short Description: Two men try to convince themselves they've committed the perfect murder by hosting a dinner party after strangling a former classmate to death.

Title: The Leopard
Short Description: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.

Title: King Kong
Short Description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for a location shoot, where they capture a colossal ape who takes a shine to their blonde starlet, and bring him back to New York City.

Title: The Raid 2
Short Description: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

Title: Harold and Maude
Short Description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

Title: Tampopo
Short Description: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

Title: The Hustler
Short Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Title: Mirror
Short Description: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

Title: The Big Sleep
Short Description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail--and what might be love.

Title: Talk to Her
Short Description: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

Title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
Short Description: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Title: High Noon
Short Description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Title: Patton
Short Description: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

Title: Kin-dza-dza!
Short Description: Two Russians push the wrong button on a strange device and end up on the telepathic planet Pluke with its strange societal norms.

Title: Touch of Evil
Short Description: A Mexican official and his American wife are targeted in a Texas border town by the crime family he's trying to put behind bars for drug trafficking, as his concern grows over the tactics of the local detective whose cooperation he needs.

Title: Short Term 12
Short Description: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

Title: The Killing
Short Description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Title: Leila's Brothers
Short Description: Leila, who has spent her entire life caring for her family, makes a plan as her brothers are struggling to make ends meet.

Title: Arsenic and Old Lace
Short Description: Mortimer Brewster, a Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage, risks his reputation after he decides to tie the knot. Things grow complicated when he learns that his beloved maiden aunts Abby and Martha are serial murderers.

Title: Onibaba
Short Description: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

Title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
Short Description: An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.

Title: The Conformist
Short Description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

Title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
Short Description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

Title: Mildred Pierce
Short Description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

Title: Once Were Warriors
Short Description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

Title: My Name Is Khan
Short Description: Rizwan Khan is a Muslim immigrant to the US with Asperger's syndrome. After his family falls apart in the aftermath of 9/11, he begins an epic quest across the country to speak to the President of the United States and clear his name.

Title: In Cold Blood
Short Description: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

Title: 3-Iron
Short Description: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

Title: Laura
Short Description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

Title: A Taxi Driver
Short Description: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

Title: Nostalgia
Short Description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Short Description: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

Title: Cries and Whispers
Short Description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

Title: Head-On
Short Description: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

Title: Stalag 17
Short Description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Title: My Sassy Girl
Short Description: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

Title: A Night to Remember
Short Description: On her maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic strikes an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.

Title: In a Lonely Place
Short Description: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

Title: Nine Queens
Short Description: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

Title: Kagemusha
Short Description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

Title: Kes
Short Description: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

Title: Battleship Potemkin
Short Description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

Title: Dont Look Back
Short Description: Documentary covering Bob Dylan's 1965 tour of England, which includes appearances by Joan Baez and Donovan.

Title: The Thin Man
Short Description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

Title: Maidaan
Short Description: Inspired by the Indian national football team coach and manager Syed Abdul Rahim, who is regarded as the architect of Indian football.

Title: Sullivan's Travels
Short Description: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

Title: Sleuth
Short Description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

Title: The Big Heat
Short Description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

Title: The Alpinist
Short Description: Marc-André Leclerc climbs alone, far from the limelight. The free-spirited 23-year-old makes some of the boldest solo ascents in history. With no cameras and no margin for error, Leclerc's approach is the essence of solo adventure.

Title: Kwaidan
Short Description: A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

Title: Touching the Void
Short Description: The true story of two climbers and their perilous journey up the west face of Siula Grande in the Peruvian Andes in 1985.

Title: Love Letter
Short Description: After losing her fiance in a fatal mountain-climbing incident, Hiroko was devastated. She comes across his childhood address in a school yearbook and impulsively writes to him. But what happens when she receives a reply?

Title: Flee
Short Description: A man look back over his life as he grapples with a painful secret he has keep hidden for 20 years, one that threatens to derail the life he has built for himself and his soon to be husband.

Title: Lift to the Scaffold
Short Description: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

Title: Miracle on 34th Street
Short Description: After a divorced New York mother hires a nice old man to play Santa Claus at Macy's, she is startled by his claim to be the genuine article. When his sanity is questioned, a lawyer defends him in court by arguing that he's not mistaken.

Title: Now, Voyager
Short Description: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

Title: The Greatest Night in Pop
Short Description: On January 28th 1985, dozens of the era's most popular musicians gathered in Los Angeles to record a charity single for African famine relief. Setting egos aside, they collaborated on a song that would make history.

Title: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
Short Description: A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.

Title: Jab We Met
Short Description: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

Title: The Lost Weekend
Short Description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: The Red Circle
Short Description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: No Man's Land
Short Description: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

Title: La Belle et la Bête
Short Description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

Title: About Elly
Short Description: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

Title: The Return
Short Description: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

Title: Opening Night
Short Description: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

Title: Icarus
Short Description: When Bryan sets out to uncover the truth about doping in sports, a chance meeting with a Russian scientist transforms his story from a personal experiment into a geopolitical thriller.

Title: My Man Godfrey
Short Description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

Title: Gully Boy
Short Description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

Title: Super 30
Short Description: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

Title: The Stoning of Soraya M.
Short Description: A story told by Zahra to a French journalist of her niece Soraya Manutchehri, a 35-year-old married woman, who received capital punishment and stoned to death because of false accusations in the remote village of Kuhpayeh, Iran, in 1986.

Title: Dev.D
Short Description: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Short Description: Following the style of some of the world's most prolific street artists, an amateur filmmaker makes a foray into the art world.

Title: Eternity and a Day
Short Description: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

Title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
Short Description: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

Title: The Trap
Short Description: A couple finds out their son urgently needs an expensive heart surgery. While struggling to find the money, the father is approached by a mysterious man proposing a sinister deal.

Title: Still Walking
Short Description: A family gathers together for a commemorative ritual whose nature only gradually becomes clear.

Title: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance
Short Description: In the face of increasingly bizarre and powerful Angel attacks, Shinji Ikari and his partner Rei Ayanami are assisted by two new pilots: the fiery Asuka Langley Shikinami and the mysterious Mari Illustrious Makinami.

Title: Landscape in the Mist
Short Description: Two children journey the long road to Germany to find the man they believe to be their father.

Title: The Night
Short Description: A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.

Title: Through a Glass Darkly
Short Description: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

Title: The Thin Blue Line
Short Description: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.

Title: Don't Look Now... We're Being Shot At!
Short Description: Several ordinary Frenchmen go on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the free zone as they help British pilots avoid German captivity.

Title: Ugly
Short Description: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

Title: Angels with Dirty Faces
Short Description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

Title: The Rules of the Game
Short Description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Title: I Am Not Your Negro
Short Description: Writer James Baldwin tells the story of race in modern America with his unfinished novel, Remember This House.

Title: Night and the City
Short Description: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

Title: The Way He Looks
Short Description: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.

Title: Divorce Italian Style
Short Description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

Title: The Roaring Twenties
Short Description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

Title: The Little Foxes
Short Description: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the Deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

Title: Ivy
Short Description: When the crew of a bankrupt cargo ship gets stuck on board for months, isolation breeds pressures that sink the men into a sea of madness and terror.

Title: The Sword of Doom
Short Description: Through his unconscionable actions against others, a sociopath samurai builds a trail of vendettas that follow him closely.

Title: When We Were Kings
Short Description: Boxing documentary on the 1974 world heavyweight championship bout between defending champion, George Foreman, and the underdog challenger, Muhammad Ali.

Title: The Face of Another
Short Description: A businessman with a disfigured face obtains a lifelike mask from his doctor, but the mask starts altering his personality.

Title: Badhaai Ho
Short Description: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

Title: Deliver Us from Evil
Short Description: Documentary about Father Oliver O'Grady, a Catholic priest who was relocated to various parishes around the United States during the 1970s in an attempt by the Catholic Church to cover up his rape of dozens of children.

Title: Persons Unknown
Short Description: A motley quintet of inept small-time thieves attempt the burglary of a local pawnshop in this Italian farce.

Title: Arjun Reddy
Short Description: Arjun Reddy, a short-tempered house surgeon, gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

Title: Salaam Bombay!
Short Description: Young Krishna struggles to survive among the drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes in the back alleys and gutters of India.

Title: Trouble in Paradise
Short Description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Short Description: The story behind the infamous downing of an American Black Hawk helicopter by Somali gunmen.

Title: Letter from an Unknown Woman
Short Description: A pianist about to flee from a duel receives a letter from a woman he cannot remember, who may hold the key to his downfall.

Title: Manam
Short Description: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

Title: West of Memphis
Short Description: An examination of a failure of justice in the case against the West Memphis Three.

Title: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
Short Description: A criminal mastermind uses hypnosis to rule the rackets after death.

Title: Yol
Short Description: The difficulties experienced by five prisoners who took a weeks leave from prison.

Title: Border
Short Description: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

Title: Marley
Short Description: A documentary on the life, music, and legacy of Bob Marley.

Title: Padman
Short Description: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

Title: Madame de...
Short Description: When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in despair.

Title: Avaze gonjeshk-ha
Short Description: An ostrich-rancher, Karim, embarks on a journey to Tehran, a bustling city, to replace his daughter's hearing aid, a pivotal moment in his family's struggle for independence and cultural exchange.

Title: Cría Cuervos
Short Description: In the twilight of Francisco Franco's dictatorship, an 8-year-old orphan and her two sisters find shelter in the house of their stern aunt and try their best to acclimatize to a new reality. Can they summon up the courage to grow up?

Title: The Other Me
Short Description: A professor of criminology tries to solve five completely unrelated murders whose only link is quotes from Pythagoras.

Title: Thiruchitrambalam
Short Description: Thiruchitrambalam lives with his father and grandfather. He blames the former for the loss of his mother and sister and is not on good terms with the latter. Meanwhile, his love life is not so successful.

Title: Sonchiriya
Short Description: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

Title: The Devil and Daniel Johnston
Short Description: Daniel Johnston, manic-depressive genius singer/songwriter/artist is revealed in this portrait of madness, creativity and love.

Title: Airlift
Short Description: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

Title: Gemide
Short Description: Sailors want to remain in their small world, warm and cozy and full of lies, but they kidnap a prostitute from some pimps.

Title: Baby
Short Description: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

Title: Ankhon Dekhi
Short Description: After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.

Title: Vishwaroopam
Short Description: Vishwanathan, a Kathak dance teacher in New York, is in a rather happy marriage with Nirupama who is a nuclear oncologist. She hires a detective to keep a watch on her husband, who apparently ends up in a wrong place that reveals Vishwanathan's true identity.

Title: The Book of Sun
Short Description: In 2010, high school senior Husam, his best friend Maan, their one-time foe Ibrahim, and their teacher Orabi set out to produce a no-budget horror movie.

Title: The Class
Short Description: An average Estonian high-schooler decides to defend his bullied classmate. This starts war between him and the informal leader of the class. As teenagers' honour is a touchy thing, everything ends in bloodshed.

Title: Anvil: The Story of Anvil
Short Description: Since 1978, Anvil has become one of heavy metal's most influential yet commercially unsuccessful acts. In 2006, after a fledging European tour Anvil sets out to record their thirteenth album and continue to follow their dreams.

Title: Earth
Short Description: Feature-length version of the documentary TV series Planet Earth (2006), following the migration paths of four animal families.

Title: Winged Migration
Short Description: Documentary on the migratory patterns of birds, shot over the course of three years on all seven continents.

Title: Microcosmos : le peuple de l'herbe
Short Description: A documentary on insect life in meadows and ponds.

Title: Karthikeya 2
Short Description: A sequel to Karthikeya (2014), which deals with the personal problems of Karthikeya and how his pursuit of the truth leads him to find out the power of Indian ancient system and Tatva of Lord Sri Krishna.

Title: Devrim Arabalari
Short Description: In the years of military coup, Turkey was unable to produce its own cars. But Pasha believed that Turkish people can produce their own cars so he ordered 2 cars. Gunduz and engineers with him must produce 2 cars in only 130 days.

Title: BTS Permission to Dance on Stage - Seoul: Live Viewing
Short Description: Permission to Dance On Stage is a series of performances headlined by South Korean band BTS.

Title: Deva
Short Description: A brilliant yet rebellious police officer uncovers a web of deceit and betrayal while investigating a high-profile case.

Title: Poor Things
Short Description: An account of the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

Title: Nosferatu: A Symphony of Horror
Short Description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

Title: The Batman
Short Description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, the Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Short Description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: The Gentlemen
Short Description: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

Title: The Notebook
Short Description: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.

Title: Pride & Prejudice
Short Description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Title: Apocalypto
Short Description: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

Title: Call Me by Your Name
Short Description: It's the summer of 1983, and 17-year-old Elio is spending the days with his family at their villa in Lombardy, Italy. He soon meets Oliver, who's working as an intern for Elio's father. They discover the heady beauty of awakening desire.

Title: Tombstone
Short Description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Short Description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Memoir of a Snail
Short Description: A bittersweet memoir of a melancholic woman called Grace Pudel - a hoarder of snails, romance novels, and guinea pigs.

Title: Little Women
Short Description: 19th century Massachusetts. While the March sisters - Jo, Meg, Amy, and Beth - enter the threshold of womanhood, they go through many ups and downs in life and endeavor to make important decisions that can affect their future.

Title: The Breakfast Club
Short Description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Title: Hidden Figures
Short Description: Three female African-American mathematicians play a pivotal role in astronaut John Glenn's launch into orbit while dealing with racial and gender discrimination.

Title: About Time
Short Description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Title: Past Lives
Short Description: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrested apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Twenty years later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

Title: Get Out
Short Description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

Title: The Social Network
Short Description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Short Description: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Title: The Big Short
Short Description: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Title: Atonement
Short Description: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

Title: The Day of the Jackal
Short Description: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Short Description: A brash, cocky high school senior, tired of skipping school to spend a boring day at home, is determined to enjoy an epic day roaring around his favorite Chicago sites, enlisting his best friend and girlfriend to join him on the adventure.

Title: The Irishman
Short Description: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

Title: Drive
Short Description: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver.

Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Short Description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

Title: Rogue One
Short Description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

Title: A Bronx Tale
Short Description: An intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

Title: The Untouchables
Short Description: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

Title: Predator
Short Description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

Title: Dunkirk
Short Description: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Title: Ghostbusters
Short Description: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

Title: Paddington 2
Short Description: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

Title: Awakenings
Short Description: Dr. Sayer is a pioneering neurologist who wants to take a risk and give his patients who suffer from encephalitis a drug used for Parkinson's Disease. He tries it out on one man who miraculously wakes from his perpetual catatonic state.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Short Description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by hacker Lisbeth Salander.

Title: Society of the Snow
Short Description: The flight of a rugby team crashes on a glacier in the Andes. The few passengers who survive the crash find themselves in one of the world's toughest environments to survive.

Title: The Fall
Short Description: In 1920s Los Angeles, a bedridden patient in a hospital captivates a young girl with a fantastic tale of heroes, myths, and villains on a desert island.

Title: Remember the Titans
Short Description: In 1971, Virginia high-school football was everything to the people of Alexandria, but when the school board was forced to integrate an all-Black school with an all-white one, the foundation of football's tradition was put to the test.

Title: Manchester by the Sea
Short Description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Short Description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Title: I Saw the Devil
Short Description: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

Title: Nightcrawler
Short Description: A petty thief desperate for work muscles into the world of crime journalism and becomes the star of his own story as he blurs the line between observer and participant.

Title: Captain Fantastic
Short Description: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

Title: The Bourne Identity
Short Description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Title: Misery
Short Description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Short Description: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Short Description: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

Title: Little Miss Sunshine
Short Description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
Short Description: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

Title: Training Day
Short Description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Short Description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
Short Description: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain, their homeland, from the dragon Smaug.

Title: Cast Away
Short Description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Title: The Lion in Winter
Short Description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

Title: Hot Fuzz
Short Description: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, all while a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

Title: Walk the Line
Short Description: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

Title: The Sandlot Kids
Short Description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

Title: The Last Samurai
Short Description: In 19th century Japan, Nathan Algren, a US army captain, is hired by the Japanese emperor to train his army in the modern warfare techniques. Captain Algren finds himself trapped in a struggle between two eras and two worlds.

Title: Skyfall
Short Description: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

Title: Mary Poppins
Short Description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

Title: RRR
Short Description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

Title: Big Hero 6
Short Description: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Title: The Man from Earth
Short Description: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

Title: Back to the Future Part II
Short Description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

Title: Close
Short Description: The intense friendship between two thirteen-year old boys Leo and Remi suddenly gets disrupted. Struggling to understand what has happened, Léo approaches Sophie, Rémi's mother. "Close" is a film about friendship and responsibility.

Title: The Fugitive
Short Description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

Title: Coraline
Short Description: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.

Title: Serenity
Short Description: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

Title: Monster
Short Description: A mother demands answers from her son's teacher when her son begins acting strangely.

Title: American Gangster
Short Description: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Title: Mississippi Burning
Short Description: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

Title: Midnight Cowboy
Short Description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Title: Boyz n the Hood
Short Description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

Title: Brazil
Short Description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Title: Moonrise Kingdom
Short Description: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
Short Description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

Title: Moon
Short Description: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

Title: Straight Outta Compton
Short Description: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes hip-hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

Title: Let the Right One In
Short Description: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Title: Cabaret
Short Description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

Title: The Fighter
Short Description: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

Title: The Insider
Short Description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

Title: Look Back
Short Description: The overly confident Fujino and the shut-in Kyomoto couldn't be more different, but a love of drawing manga brings these two small-town girls together.

Title: Captain Phillips
Short Description: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

Title: Kiki's Delivery Service
Short Description: Along with her black cat Jiji, Kiki settles in a seaside town and starts a high-flying delivery service. Here begins her magical encounter with independence and responsibility, making lifelong friends and finding her place in the world.

Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Short Description: Influential industrialist Vanger's niece Harriet disappeared under mysterious circumstances 40 years ago. As a last attempt at solving the case, he hires investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.

Title: Aavesham
Short Description: Three teenagers reach Bangalore for their engineering degree and gets involved in a fight with seniors. They find a local gangster named Ranga to help them take revenge.

Title: Hud
Short Description: Honest, hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant, egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

Title: Isle of Dogs
Short Description: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Short Description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

Title: The World's Fastest Indian
Short Description: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

Title: The Searchers
Short Description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

Title: Kramer vs. Kramer
Short Description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Title: Glory
Short Description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

Title: The Asphalt Jungle
Short Description: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

Title: Dawn of the Dead
Short Description: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: A Prophet
Short Description: A delinquent Muslim man struggles to get by in prison until he is taken under the wing of a powerful mob boss. But his gradual rise through the mob's ranks brings him in conflict with his mentor.

Title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
Short Description: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

Title: Thirteen Lives
Short Description: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

Title: The Wind Rises
Short Description: Jiro Horikoshi studies assiduously to fulfill his aim of becoming an aeronautical engineer. As WWII begins, fighter aircraft designed by him end up getting used by the Japanese Empire against its foes.

Title: Charade
Short Description: Romance and intrigue ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want to get their hands on a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. She soon loses trust in those who claim they want to help her.

Title: Deception
Short Description: Virgil Oldman, a wealthy art auctioneer, takes the help of a young artificer, Robert, to understand and woo Claire Ibbetson, a young heiress, who hires him to auction off an antique collection.

Title: The Remains of the Day
Short Description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

Title: The Right Stuff
Short Description: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

Title: The Bad and the Beautiful
Short Description: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.

Title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Short Description: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

Title: Lilya 4-Ever
Short Description: Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.

Title: Three Colors: Blue
Short Description: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

Title: The Artist
Short Description: When George, a silent movie superstar, meets Peppy Miller, a dancer, sparks fly between the two. However, after the introduction of talking pictures, their fortunes change, affecting their dynamic.

Title: Whisper of the Heart
Short Description: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

Title: Imitation of Life
Short Description: An aspiring white actress takes in an African American widow whose mixed-race daughter is desperate to be seen as white.

Title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
Short Description: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

Title: Ed Wood
Short Description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams despite his lack of talent.

Title: All That Jazz
Short Description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

Title: The Chaser
Short Description: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

Title: The Killing Fields
Short Description: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during Pol Pot's bloody Year Zero cleansing campaign.

Title: Stagecoach
Short Description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

Title: Breaking the Waves
Short Description: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

Title: The King of Comedy
Short Description: Rupert is an aspiring stand-up comedian, who is willing to go the extra mile in his attempt to appear in the late night show hosted by his idol.

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Short Description: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
Short Description: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

Title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
Short Description: A White couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her Black fiancé.

Title: Bramayugam
Short Description: Thevan, a folk singer of the Paanan caste, has a fateful encounter when escaping slavery, leading to him discovering an ancient traditional mansion altering his destiny.

Title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
Short Description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

Title: Frankenstein
Short Description: Dr Henry Frankenstein is obsessed with assembling a living being from parts of several exhumed corpses.

Title: October Sky
Short Description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

Title: Loving Vincent
Short Description: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

Title: My Left Foot
Short Description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

Title: Ninja Scroll
Short Description: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

Title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0: The Movie
Short Description: The prequel to Jujutsu Kaisen (2020), where a high schooler gains control of an extremely powerful cursed spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers.

Title: The White Ribbon
Short Description: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

Title: Once
Short Description: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

Title: Letters from Iwo Jima
Short Description: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

Title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
Short Description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

Title: Freaks
Short Description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist Cleopatra agrees to marry Hans the leader of side-show performers, but Hans' deformed friends discover that she is only marrying him for his inheritance. So they seek revenge.

Title: Gaslight
Short Description: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the house rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

Title: Grizzly Man
Short Description: A devastating and heart-rending take on grizzly bear activists Timothy Treadwell and Amie Huguenard, who were killed in October of 2003 while living among grizzly bears in Alaska.

Title: East of Eden
Short Description: Two brothers in 1910s California struggle to maintain the favor of their affectionate but strict, Bible-toting father as an old secret about their long-absent mother comes to light.

Title: The Philadelphia Story
Short Description: After a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
Short Description: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

Title: His Girl Friday
Short Description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from quitting and remarrying, using an exclusive interview with a death row convict as an enticement to buy himself some time to win her back.

Title: Manhattan
Short Description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Short Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually committed by a new vigilante assassin.

Title: All About My Mother
Short Description: A comedy-drama about a bereaved mother, an overwrought actress, her jealous lover, and a pregnant nun.

Title: Amarcord
Short Description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: Pride
Short Description: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

Title: That Obscure Object of Desire
Short Description: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

Title: Shadow of a Doubt
Short Description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

Title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
Short Description: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

Title: Hannah and Her Sisters
Short Description: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

Title: You Can't Take It with You
Short Description: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

Title: Playtime
Short Description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

Title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
Short Description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in a grueling and inhumane dance marathon.

Title: Breaker Morant
Short Description: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

Title: Bride of Frankenstein
Short Description: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Baron Henry Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

Title: To Have and Have Not
Short Description: During World War II, an American expatriate helps transport a French Resistance leader and his wife to Martinique while romancing a lounge singer.

Title: American Movie
Short Description: Documentary about an aspiring filmmaker's attempts to finance his dream project by finally completing the low-budget horror film he abandoned years before.

Title: The Lunchbox
Short Description: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

Title: Bringing Up Baby
Short Description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

Title: Article 370
Short Description: Ahead of a major constitutional decision, special agent Zooni Haksar is tasked with a secret mission to quell violence in a conflict-ridden region.

Title: Land of Mine
Short Description: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.

Title: Tokyo Godfathers
Short Description: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

Title: Veer Zaara
Short Description: An Indian Air Force pilot rescues a Pakistani girl stranded in India. Years later, a lawyer seeks to unravel the truth behind the pilot's mysterious imprisonment in Pakistan for over two decades, during which he remained silent.

Title: Premalu
Short Description: Sachin's quest for love takes unexpected turns, creating a laughter-filled love triangle.

Title: Like Father, Like Son
Short Description: Ryota is a successful workaholic businessman. When he learns that his biological son was switched with another boy after birth, he faces the difficult decision to choose his true son or the boy he and his wife have raised as their own.

Title: The Train
Short Description: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

Title: The Children's Hour
Short Description: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

Title: Cléo from 5 to 7
Short Description: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

Title: I, Daniel Blake
Short Description: After surviving a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight bureaucratic forces to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

Title: Oliver Twist
Short Description: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

Title: Great Expectations
Short Description: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

Title: The Chorus
Short Description: Pierre, a successful orchestra conductor, returns home when his mother dies. He stumbles upon an old diary and recollects the childhood school memories and his music teacher Clement Mathieu.

Title: Babette's Feast
Short Description: During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.

Title: Becket
Short Description: King Henry II of England comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant Thomas Becket, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the King's.

Title: Johnny Got His Gun
Short Description: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
Short Description: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

Title: Birdman of Alcatraz
Short Description: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

Title: My Life as a Courgette
Short Description: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to an orphanage with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Short Description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

Title: Millennium Actress
Short Description: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

Title: Amy
Short Description: Archival footage and personal testimonials present an intimate portrait of the life and career of British singer/songwriter Amy Winehouse.

Title: The Court Jester
Short Description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.

Title: The Second Mother
Short Description: When the estranged daughter of a hard-working live-in housekeeper suddenly appears, the unspoken class barriers that exist within the home are thrown into disarray.

Title: Amar Singh Chamkila
Short Description: Follows the life of pop star duo Amar Singh Chamkila and Amarjot Kaur, whose songs that were social commentaries or devotionals became massive hits in the 80's.

Title: Eat Drink Man Woman
Short Description: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

Title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
Short Description: The Muppets put their spin on the tale of an elder, Christmas-hating miser who is visited by spirits who foretell his future and share secrets from his past and present, which helps change his view on life.

Title: Ninotchka
Short Description: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

Title: Vivre Sa Vie
Short Description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
Short Description: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.

Title: The Servant
Short Description: Upper-class Tony hires servant Hugo Barrett, who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

Title: Days of Wine and Roses
Short Description: An alcoholic marries a young woman and systematically addicts her to booze so that they can share his "passion" together.

Title: Embrace of the Serpent
Short Description: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of forty years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.

Title: Mimi
Short Description: Mimi is introduced by Bhanu to an American couple as a surrogate in exchange for Rs 2 million. She decides to have the baby even when they change their mind and tells her parent that Bhanu is the father.

Title: Seven Days in May
Short Description: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

Title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
Short Description: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

Title: The Postman
Short Description: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

Title: Chandu Champion
Short Description: A man who faced one adversary after another with an undying spirit. His unwavering zeal and never give up attitude led to India's first individual gold medal in any form of the Olympics.

Title: One, Two, Three
Short Description: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

Title: Ernest & Celestine
Short Description: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

Title: Gimme Shelter
Short Description: When three hundred thousand members of the Love Generation collided with a few dozen Hells Angels at San Francisco's Altamont Speedway, the bloody slash that transformed a decade's dreams into disillusionment was immortalized on this film.

Title: Stray Dog
Short Description: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

Title: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
Short Description: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.

Title: Rockstar
Short Description: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

Title: Food, Inc.
Short Description: An unflattering look inside America's corporate controlled food industry.

Title: Law of Tehran
Short Description: The police are after a drug lord named Naser Khakzad, but when they finally manage to catch him, he tries whatever he can think of to escape and save his family.

Title: The Game Changers
Short Description: A UFC fighter's world is turned upside down when he discovers an elite group of world-renowned athletes and scientists who prove that everything he had been taught about protein was a lie.

Title: Alice in the Cities
Short Description: A German journalist is saddled with a nine-year-old girl after encountering her mother at a New York airport.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
Short Description: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawk is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison.

Title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
Short Description: A documentary on 85-year-old sushi master Jiro Ono, his renowned Tokyo restaurant, and his relationship with his son and eventual heir, Yoshikazu.

Title: I Vitelloni
Short Description: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

Title: C.R.A.Z.Y.
Short Description: Zachary is confused about his sexuality and is in conflict with his Catholic upbringing which alienates his parents. Forcing himself to like girls, Zachary also has to cope with his older brothers, who don't make his life any easier.

Title: My Night at Maud's
Short Description: A devout Catholic man's rigid principles are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

Title: System Crasher
Short Description: 9-year-old Benni is a toss-up between institutions that cannot tackle her outbursts. She wants to move in with her mother, but she can not handle her wild daughter. After Micha is hired Benni slowly opens up and attaches herself to him.

Title: In This Corner (and Other Corners) of the World
Short Description: A spirited 18-year-old woman is married off to a man she barely knows as she combats the daily struggles of living in Hiroshima during World War II.

Title: Interstella 5555: The 5tory of the 5ecret 5tar 5ystem
Short Description: Four talented alien musicians are kidnapped by a record producer who disguises them as humans and has them reprogrammed to forget their real identities and play soulless corporate pop as The Crescendolls.

Title: The Hill
Short Description: In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.

Title: Take Care of Maya
