Short Description: As a medical team tries to understand 10-year-old Maya Kowalski's rare illness, they begin to question her parents. Suddenly, Maya is in state custody, and her family is desperate to bring their daughter home.

Title: Steins;Gate: The Movie - Load Region of Déjà Vu
Short Description: After the events of the anime, Rintarou begins to feel the repercussions of extensive time travel, and eventually completely fades from reality. Kurisu, being the only companion to remember him, now must find a way to bring him back.

Title: Utomlennye solntsem
Short Description: In the USSR in 1936, shadows of Stalin's repressions fall on a famous, revolutionary hero. The accusations of him being a foreign spy are nonsense, and everyone knows that. However, a slow process of his downfall has already started.

Title: Orpheus
Short Description: A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

Title: Joji
Short Description: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

Title: Hindi Medium
Short Description: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

Title: Brother
Short Description: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

Title: Minnal Murali
Short Description: A tailor gains special powers after being struck by lightning, but must take down an unexpected foe if he is to become the superhero his hometown needs.

Title: A Night at the Opera
Short Description: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

Title: Poetry
Short Description: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

Title: Oasis
Short Description: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

Title: Ghost in the Shell 2.0
Short Description: A hacker known as the Puppet Master is hunted by a female cyborg cop and her partner. This film is a revised version of Ghost in the Shell (1995).

Title: My Best Fiend
Short Description: The love-hate relationship between Werner Herzog and Klaus Kinski, the deep trust between the director and the actor, and their independently and simultaneously hatched plans to murder one another.

Title: Before the Rain
Short Description: Three interconnected stories of love under the threat of civil war in Macedonia and London.

Title: Fury
Short Description: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

Title: The Island
Short Description: Somewhere in Northern Russia in a small Russian Orthodox monastery lives an unusual man whose bizarre conduct confuses his fellow monks, while others who visit the island believe that the man has the power to heal, exorcise demons and foretell the future.

Title: Germany Year Zero
Short Description: A young German boy faces the problems of the tough life in the immediate post-WWII Berlin.

Title: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
Short Description: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

Title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
Short Description: A group of youths aspiring to become professional superheroes, fight in a world full of people with abilities, also known as quirks. Deku and his fellow classmates from Hero Academy face Nine, the strongest villain yet.

Title: Good Morning
Short Description: Two boys begin a silence strike to press their parents into buying them a television set.

Title: Intelligent Khiladi
Short Description: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

Title: Seven Chances
Short Description: A man learns that he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7PM that evening.

Title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
Short Description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

Title: For Love and Honour
Short Description: A retired former dangerous man battling Alzheimer's must fight a new generation of mafia boss for the girl his son loves.

Title: Parking
Short Description: An elderly man and a youngster who are tenants sharing two different floors of an individual house fight over a parking space.

Title: Le Feu Follet
Short Description: Depressed Alain Leroy leaves the clinic where he was detoxified. He meets friends, acquaintances and women, trying to find a reason to continue living. Will this help him?

Title: Monsieur Verdoux
Short Description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

Title: Mamma Roma
Short Description: An ex-prostitute reunites with her son, but an extortion scheme threatens her aspirations for a decent life.

Title: Johnny Gaddaar
Short Description: Five criminals, who run a gambling club, pool money for a drug deal set up by a corrupt police officer, but when their youngest teammate plans to steal the suitcase containing the money, murder enters the scene.

Title: The Death of Mr. Lazarescu
Short Description: Mr. Lãzãrescu, a dying old man, is shuttled from hospital to hospital by a loyal paramedic as doctors refuse to operate and no one can agree on a diagnosis.

Title: Lakshya
Short Description: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

Title: The Set-Up
Short Description: Expecting the usual loss, a boxing manager takes bribes from a betting gangster without telling his fighter.

Title: Faces, Places
Short Description: Director Agnes Varda and photographer/muralist J.R. journey through rural France and form an unlikely friendship.

Title: Secret Superstar
Short Description: A talented teenage singer/songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

Title: Simon of the Desert
Short Description: Simon, a deeply religious man living in the 4th century, wants to be nearer to God so he climbs a column. The Devil wants him to come down to Earth and is trying to seduce him.

Title: Who Killed Captain Alex?
Short Description: Uganda's president gives Captain Alex an assignment to defeat the Tiger Mafia, but he gets killed in the process. Upon hearing the tragic news, his brother investigates to avenge Alex's death.

Title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
Short Description: A compilation of found footage featuring music, interviews, and stories of The Beatles' 250 concerts from 1963 to 1966.

Title: El hijo de la novia
Short Description: A dissatisfied 40-year-old, separated and without time for his own daughter and girlfriend must rethink his life when his father decides to marry his mother, who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, by church.

Title: Kai po che!
Short Description: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

Title: Sound City
Short Description: A documentary on the fabled recording studio that was located in Van Nuys, California.

Title: South Wind
Short Description: A young member of an underground gang in Belgrade puts himself and his family in danger when he crosses a mafia leader who works for the chief of police.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

Title: Supersonic
Short Description: Oasis's breakthrough years documented into a detailed depiction of the infamous brothers from Manchester forming the band in the early '90s leading up to the legendary performance at Knebworth.

Title: English Vinglish
Short Description: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

Title: The Dissident
Short Description: When Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi disappears in Istanbul, his fiancée and dissidents around the world piece together the clues to a murder and expose a global cover up.

Title: Le corbeau
Short Description: A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.

Title: Nanban
Short Description: 10 years after leaving college, two best friends and their rival go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.

Title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
Short Description: The Monty Python troupe perform a combination of classic sketches and new material at the Hollywood Bowl.

Title: Mother India
Short Description: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, she always sticks to her own moral code.

Title: Life Itself
Short Description: The life and career of the renowned film critic and social commentator, Roger Ebert.

Title: Nayak: The Real Hero
Short Description: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

Title: Lovelorn
Short Description: A single mother with a child meets a retired teacher who tries to keep pace with his new life and to protect them from her ex-husband.

Title: Gangaajal
Short Description: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

Title: Anora
Short Description: A young escort from Brooklyn meets and impulsively marries the son of a Russian oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairy tale is threatened as his parents set out for New York to get the marriage annulled.

Title: The Goonies
Short Description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

Title: Sing Sing
Short Description: Divine G, imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit, finds purpose by acting in a theatre group alongside other incarcerated men in this story of resilience, humanity, and the transformative power of art.

Title: Blue Velvet
Short Description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Short Description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
Short Description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

Title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Short Description: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Title: Sense and Sensibility
Short Description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The older two daughters are the title opposites.

Title: Sicario
Short Description: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

Title: Wind River
Short Description: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Short Description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Title: Blue Is the Warmest Colour
Short Description: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

Title: Airplane!
Short Description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.

Title: The Count of Monte Cristo
Short Description: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

Title: The Hangover
Short Description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must make their way around the city in order to find their friend in time for his wedding.

Title: Y tu mamá también
Short Description: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life and each other.

Title: Zodiac
Short Description: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

Title: Home Alone
Short Description: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas Eve.

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Short Description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Short Description: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

Title: Silver Linings Playbook
Short Description: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

Title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
Short Description: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

Title: Taken
Short Description: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

Title: Ex Machina
Short Description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

Title: Godzilla Minus One
Short Description: Post-war Japan is at its lowest point when a new crisis emerges in the form of a giant monster, baptized in the horrific power of the atomic bomb.

Title: 500 Days of Summer
Short Description: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Title: Ocean's Eleven
Short Description: Danny Ocean, a gangster, rounds up a gang of associates to stage a sophisticated and elaborate casino heist which involves robbing three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously during a popular boxing event.

Title: Tangled
Short Description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
Short Description: A group of terrorists plans to detonate three plutonium cores for a simultaneous nuclear attack on different cities. Ethan Hunt, along with his IMF team, sets out to stop the carnage.

Title: Brokeback Mountain
Short Description: Two shepherds fall for each other, but their relationship becomes complicated when they both get married to their respective girlfriends.

Title: Mulan
Short Description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Title: The Banshees of Inisherin
Short Description: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

Title: Lost in Translation
Short Description: A fading movie star falls for a lonely young woman in Tokyo.

Title: The Game
Short Description: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

Title: When Harry Met Sally
Short Description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Title: A Few Good Men
Short Description: A military lawyer is tasked with defending two US Marines charged with murdering a fellow Marine and intends to prove they were only following their base commander's orders.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Short Description: Harry Potter is tasked with the dangerous and seemingly impossible task of locating and destroying Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes. Harry must rely on Ron and Hermione more than ever, but dark forces threaten to tear them apart.

Title: Bonnie and Clyde
Short Description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

Title: Primal Fear
Short Description: The murder of a high and mighty archbishop leads to the involvement of Martin Vail, Chicago's best attorney. As he studies the suspects, he becomes convinced of certain aspects, but there's more to the story than meets the eye.

Title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
Short Description: When a cartoon rabbit is accused of murder, he enlists the help of a burnt out private investigator to prove his innocence.

Title: Gattaca
Short Description: Vincent, an "In-Valid", assumes the identity of a member of the genetic elite to pursue his goal of traveling into space with the Gattaca Aerospace Corporation. However, a week before his mission, a murder marks Vincent as a suspect.

Title: Apollo 13
Short Description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

Title: Crash
Short Description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

Title: The Worst Person in the World
Short Description: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

Title: X-Men: First Class
Short Description: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Short Description: In order to ruin a western town and steal their land, a corrupt politician appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Title: Malcolm X
Short Description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.

Title: First Blood
Short Description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

Title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
Short Description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
Short Description: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

Title: The Magnificent Seven
Short Description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

Title: Road to Perdition
Short Description: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
Short Description: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

Title: The Holy Mountain
Short Description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

Title: Another Round
Short Description: Four high-school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

Title: Man on Fire
Short Description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: Flipped
Short Description: When Juli meets Bryce in the second grade, she knows it's true love. After spending six years trying to convince Bryce of the same, she's ready to give up--until he starts to reconsider.

Title: Argo
Short Description: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

Title: The Color Purple
Short Description: A tale spanning forty years in the life of Celie, an African-American woman living in the South who survives incredible abuse and bigotry.

Title: Donnie Brasco
Short Description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

Title: Ray
Short Description: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

Title: Naked
Short Description: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

Title: Gravity
Short Description: Dr Ryan Stone, an engineer on her first space mission, and Matt Kowalski, an astronaut on his final expedition, have to survive in space after they are hit by debris while spacewalking.

Title: As Good as It Gets
Short Description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

Title: Wreck-It Ralph
Short Description: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But he accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade.

Title: The Lego Movie
Short Description: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

Title: The Theory of Everything
Short Description: Stephen Hawking gets unprecedented success in the field of physics despite being diagnosed with motor neuron disease at the age of 21. He defeats awful odds as his first wife Jane aids him loyally.

Title: Star Trek Into Darkness
Short Description: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

Title: The Name of the Rose
Short Description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

Title: Paprika
Short Description: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

Title: The Promised Land
Short Description: The story of Danish soldier and explorer Ludvig Kahlen, who explored and cultivated Denmark's wild Jutland, which now comprises the vast majority of the country, in the mid-18th century.

Title: The Bourne Supremacy
Short Description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

Title: Glengarry Glen Ross
Short Description: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

Title: Halloween
Short Description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois, to kill again.

Title: Being John Malkovich
Short Description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Title: The Vanishing
Short Description: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

Title: The Conversation
Short Description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

Title: Sound of Metal
Short Description: During a series of adrenaline-fueled gigs, itinerant punk-metal drummer Ruben begins to experience hearing loss. When a specialist tells him his condition will rapidly worsen, he thinks his music career - and with it his life - is over.

Title: Empire of the Sun
Short Description: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

Title: Detachment
Short Description: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

Title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
Short Description: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

Title: Mr. Nobody
Short Description: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

Title: Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe
Short Description: Evelyn, an ordinary housewife, visits a nursing home and befriends the old lady Ninny. Together, they bond over stories from the past about two intrepid women of Whistle Stop Cafe.

Title: The French Connection
Short Description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Title: Adaptation.
Short Description: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

Title: Dirty Harry
Short Description: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

Title: Philadelphia
Short Description: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small-time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

Title: Kung Fu Hustle
Short Description: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

Title: The Great Beauty
Short Description: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

Title: Roma
Short Description: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

Title: Happiness
Short Description: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts which society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

Title: Black Book
Short Description: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance. Things get complicated when she falls for the enemy.

Title: Serpico
Short Description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

Title: The Devils
Short Description: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

Title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Short Description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

Title: Goldfinger
Short Description: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

Title: Changeling
Short Description: After Christine's son goes missing, she reaches out to the LAPD to find him, but when they try to pass off an impostor as her son to quiet public protests, she refuses to accept him or give up hope.

Title: The Quiet Man
Short Description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in 1920s Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

Title: Lucky Number Slevin
Short Description: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

Title: Billy Elliot
Short Description: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

Title: The Last Emperor
Short Description: Bernardo Bertolucci's Oscar-winning dramatization of China's eleventh and final monarch of the Qing dynasty: Emperor Puyi.

Title: This Is England
Short Description: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

Title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
Short Description: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

Title: My Fair Lady
Short Description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make a crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

Title: Miller's Crossing
Short Description: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

Title: There's Still Tomorrow
Short Description: In this moving comedic drama set in postwar Rome, a working-class wife and mother dreams of a better future. Winner of 6 Italian Academy Awards.

Title: The Man from Nowhere
Short Description: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

Title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Short Description: An alien lands in Washington, D.C. and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

Title: Black Narcissus
Short Description: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

Title: Sorcerer
Short Description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

Title: Days of Heaven
Short Description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

Title: Clerks
Short Description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

Title: Ordinary People
Short Description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

Title: Adam's Apples
Short Description: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

Title: Kubo and the Two Strings
Short Description: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

Title: My Dinner with Andre
Short Description: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

Title: The Dirty Dozen
Short Description: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

Title: Evil Dead II
Short Description: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

Title: Mother
Short Description: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

Title: Badlands
Short Description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

Title: Hamlet
Short Description: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

Title: About Dry Grasses
Short Description: A young teacher hopes to be transferred to Istanbul after four years of mandatory service in a remote village, but is accused of inappropriate contact by two students. After losing hope, a colleague offers him new perspectives on life.

Title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
Short Description: When Eric Cartman and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

Title: Porco Rosso
Short Description: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

Title: The Quiet Girl
Short Description: In rural Ireland, a quiet, neglected girl is sent away from her dysfunctional family to live with relatives for the summer where she blossoms and learns what it is to be loved.

Title: Finding Neverland
Short Description: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

Title: Waking Life
Short Description: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

Title: A Man Called Ove
Short Description: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

Title: Open Your Eyes
Short Description: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

Title: Zulu
Short Description: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

Title: Red River
Short Description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

Title: The Motorcycle Diaries
Short Description: Ernesto Guevara de la Serna, popularly known as Che, along with his friend Alberto Granado, decides to take a road trip across South America. His experiences on the journey transform him.

Title: Beasts of No Nation
Short Description: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

Title: The Longest Day
Short Description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

Title: Fantasia
Short Description: A series of eight famous pieces of classical music, conducted by Leopold Stokowski and interpreted in animation by Walt Disney's team of artists.

Title: The Verdict
Short Description: An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Title: 3 Women
Short Description: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other an awkward teenager, share an increasingly bizarre relationship.

Title: The Eight Mountains
Short Description: An epic journey of friendship and self-discovery set in the breathtaking Italian Alps, The Eight Mountains follows over four decades the profound, complex relationship between Pietro and Bruno.

Title: The Innocents
Short Description: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

Title: Plein Soleil
Short Description: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

Title: Never Look Away
Short Description: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

Title: Breaking Away
Short Description: A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.

Title: Nebraska
Short Description: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

Title: A Man for All Seasons
Short Description: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

Title: The Man Who Would Be King
Short Description: In 1880s India, two former British soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

Title: Breathless
Short Description: A small-time crook, hunted by the authorities for a car theft and the murder of a police officer, attempts to persuade a hip American journalism student to run away with him to Italy.

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Short Description: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

Title: Joint Security Area
Short Description: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

Title: Good Bye Lenin!
Short Description: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

Title: Confessions
Short Description: Yuko, a teacher of middle-school, is shattered to see her four-year-old daughter dead. She returns back to the school and finds out that her students are responsible for her daughter's murder.

Title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
Short Description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

Title: Fantastic Planet
Short Description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

Title: Marty
Short Description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

Title: Hanu Man
Short Description: An imaginary place called Anjanadri where the protagonist gets the powers of Hanuman and fights for Anjanadri.

Title: Dreams
Short Description: A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.

Title: Night on Earth
Short Description: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

Title: The Music Man
Short Description: Traveling con artist Harold Hill targets the naïve residents of a small town in 1910s Iowa by posing as a boys' band leader to raise money before he can skip town.

Title: The African Queen
Short Description: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

Title: The Magdalene Sisters
Short Description: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

Title: Scarface
Short Description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

Title: Happy Together
Short Description: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

Title: Wait Until Dark
Short Description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

Title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
Short Description: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

Title: What's Up, Doc?
Short Description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

Title: How Green Was My Valley
Short Description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

Title: The Great Silence
Short Description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

Title: Hard Boiled
Short Description: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

Title: Perfect Strangers
Short Description: Seven long-time friends meet for dinner. They decide to share their text messages, emails and phone calls. Secrets are unveiled. Harmony trembles.

Title: The Joy Luck Club
Short Description: Four Chinese women along with their mothers delve into their past and try to find answers. Slowly, this search helps them to understand the complex relationship they share with each other.

Title: The Cure
Short Description: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.

Title: Ball of Fire
Short Description: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia while living in a Manhattan mansion take in a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mob boss lover.

Title: Evil
Short Description: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

Title: Taste of Cherry
Short Description: An Iranian man drives his car in search of someone who will quietly bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.

Title: The Killer
Short Description: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore the vision of a singer he accidentally blinded.

Title: L'Avventura
Short Description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

Title: The Spirit of the Beehive
Short Description: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven-year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

Title: Splendour in the Grass
Short Description: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

Title: Key Largo
Short Description: A drifter visits the family hotel of a war buddy who was killed in action only to find that a Chicago mobster and his gang have taken over the place. As a hurricane approaches, a confrontation ensues.

Title: Das Experiment
Short Description: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

Title: The Gunfighter
Short Description: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

Title: The Breadwinner
Short Description: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

Title: The Caine Mutiny
Short Description: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardises the ship, the first officer is urged to consider relieving him of command.

Title: The Killers
Short Description: Hit men arrive in a small New Jersey town to kill an unresisting victim, and insurance investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

Title: A Place in the Sun
Short Description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
Short Description: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Title: Cape Fear
Short Description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

Title: My Darling Clementine
Short Description: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

Title: When the Wind Blows
Short Description: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

Title: The Salesman
Short Description: While Ranaa and Emad, a married couple, are participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," she is assaulted in their new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

Title: The Women
Short Description: A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.

Title: Elmer Gantry
Short Description: A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.

Title: Au hasard Balthazar
Short Description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

Title: Missing
Short Description: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

Title: L'Eclisse
Short Description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

Title: The Turin Horse
Short Description: A rural farmer is forced to confront the mortality of his faithful horse.

Title: Holiday
Short Description: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

Title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
Short Description: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

Title: In America
Short Description: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

Title: Fireworks
Short Description: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

Title: Bad Day at Black Rock
Short Description: Following World War II, a one-armed stranger arrives in a tiny California desert town, but finds the residents hostile and protecting a terrible secret they want to keep hidden, by violent means if necessary.

Title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Short Description: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

Title: The Young Girls of Rochefort
Short Description: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

Title: After the Wedding
Short Description: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

Title: Pandora's Box
Short Description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

Title: Two Women
Short Description: In WWII Italy, a widow and her lonely daughter seek distance between themselves and the horrors of war.

Title: Udta Punjab
Short Description: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

Title: The Triplets of Belleville
Short Description: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

Title: Mon Oncle
Short Description: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

Title: Through the Olive Trees
Short Description: A depiction of the off-screen relationship between the actors who play the newlyweds in the film Life and Nothing More... (1992).

Title: Jules and Jim
Short Description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

Title: Tuntematon sotilas
Short Description: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

Title: Twelve O'Clock High
Short Description: A tough-as-nails general takes over a B-17 bomber unit suffering from low morale and whips them into fighting shape.

Title: Top Hat
Short Description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

Title: Captain Blood
Short Description: After treating a Monmouth rebel against King James II in 1680s England, a young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

Title: The Snitch
Short Description: A burglar betraying other criminals prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend who might be as untrustworthy as he.

Title: Badla
Short Description: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

Title: The Silence
Short Description: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

Title: Sword of the Stranger
Short Description: A swordsman from a strange land is caught in a struggle between morality, righteousness, and devotion as he reluctantly agrees to take a raggedy boy and his dog to a remote, Buddhist temple.

Title: The Lady Eve
Short Description: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

Title: The Marriage of Maria Braun
Short Description: Maria marries Hermann Braun in the last days of World War II, only for him to go missing in the war. Alone, Maria puts to use her beauty and ambition in order to find prosperity during Germany's "economic miracle" of the 1950s.

Title: Duck Soup
Short Description: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Title: Sergeant York
Short Description: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

Title: Mephisto
Short Description: In early-1930s Germany, a passionate stage actor faces a dilemma: renounce his apolitical stance and comply with the Reich's doctrine, or face oblivion. But, Faustian bargains never end well. What is the price of success?

Title: Boruto: Naruto the Movie
Short Description: It's been some years since the end of the Shinobi War. Naruto Uzumaki is the 7th Hokage of Konohagakure, in this new era. His son, Boruto Uzumaki, will soon enter the Chûnin exams, alongside Sarada Uchiha and the mysterious Mitsuki.

Title: The Bear
Short Description: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

Title: The Deepest Breath
Short Description: A champion and expert safety diver seemed destined for one another. Despite different paths taken, they meet at the pinnacle of the free-diving world, experiencing the thrilling rewards and inescapable risks of chasing dreams through the depths of the ocean.

Title: Navalny
Short Description: Follows the man who survived an assassination attempt by poisoning with a lethal nerve agent in August 2020. During his months-long recovery he makes shocking discoveries about the attempt on his life and decides to return home.

Title: The Awful Truth
Short Description: A married couple files an amicable divorce, but find letting go of each other harder than they originally thought.

Title: Always
Short Description: Jang Cheol-min is a former boxer who finds work as a parking space attendant. His life turns upside down when he meets Jung-hwa, a blind girl, and they begin to fall in love.

Title: We Will Dance Again
Short Description: A minute-by-minute retelling of the Supernova Music Festival Massacre, which took place on October 7th.

Title: The Past
Short Description: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

Title: Scarlet Street
Short Description: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

Title: The Edge of Heaven
Short Description: A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

Title: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
Short Description: Four historical tales depict the ongoing human struggle against prejudice and inhumanity.

Title: 14 Peaks: Nothing Is Impossible
Short Description: Fearless Nepali mountaineer Nirmal Purja embarks on a seemingly impossible quest to summit all 14 of the world's 8,000-meter peaks in seven months.

Title: The Invisible Life of Euridice Gusmao
Short Description: In 1950s Rio de Janeiro, two sisters live restricted lives with their conservative parents. After they are separated and forced to live apart, they take control of their destinies, while never giving up hope of finding one another.

Title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
Short Description: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

Title: Zero Days
Short Description: A documentary focused on Stuxnet, a piece of self-replicating computer malware that the U.S. and Israel unleashed to destroy a key part of an Iranian nuclear facility, and which ultimately spread beyond its intended target.

Title: The Classic
Short Description: Shy Ji-hae's friend asks Ji-hae to write e-mails to the boy she loves in her name. As the boy falls in love with her letters, Ji-hae discovers the story of her mother's romance which is remarkably similar to her own circumstances.

Title: Corpus Christi
Short Description: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

Title: Stroszek
Short Description: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

Title: Stutz
Short Description: Follow Hill and his therapist as he has candid discussions of mental health and the progressively worsening anxiety attacks related to movie promotion that have turned his dream job into a nightmare.

Title: Destiny
Short Description: Bekir loves Ugur, who loves Zagor, who is about to get out of jail. An already tense love triangle is thrown into turmoil on a hot summer night, when Zagor kills someone, and Ugur disappears.

Title: Nightmare Alley
Short Description: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

Title: Sam Bahadur
Short Description: Revolves around the high and low points of Sam Manekshaw who became the first Indian Army officer to be promoted to the rank of Field Marshal.

Title: Man on Wire
Short Description: A look at tightrope walker Philippe Petit's daring, but illegal, high-wire routine performed between New York City's World Trade Center's twin towers in 1974, what some consider, "the artistic crime of the century".

Title: A Letter to Three Wives
Short Description: A letter is addressed to three wives from their "best friend" Addie Ross, announcing that she is running away with one of their husbands - but she does not say which one.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
Short Description: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

Title: The Official Story
Short Description: During the final months of Argentinian Military Dictatorship in 1983, a high school teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.

Title: Meru
Short Description: Three elite climbers struggle to find their way through obsession and loss as they attempt to climb Mount Meru, one of the most coveted prizes in the high stakes game of Himalayan big wall climbing.

Title: The Phantom of Liberty
Short Description: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

Title: Kikujiro
Short Description: A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.

Title: Mind Game
Short Description: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.

Title: Waterloo Bridge
Short Description: Myra and Roy meet and fall in love on Waterloo Bridge during an air raid. Their love will be one of the war's unspoken casualties.

Title: Water
Short Description: Set in colonial India against Gandhi's rise to power, it's the story of 8-year-old Chuyia, who is widowed and sent to a home to live in penitence; once there, Chuyia's feisty presence deeply affects the lives of the other residents.

Title: One Piece: Z
Short Description: A former Marine stands in the way of the Straw Hat Pirates.

Title: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain
Short Description: A documentary about Anthony Bourdain and his career as a chef, writer and host, revered and renowned for his authentic approach to food, culture and travel.

Title: Ashes and Diamonds
Short Description: As World War II and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Soviet forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.

Title: Mr. India
Short Description: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

Title: Smiles of a Summer Night
Short Description: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

Title: Kapoor & Sons
Short Description: The story about two brothers who visit their dysfunctional family for their grandfather's birthday party.

Title: Dodsworth
Short Description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

Title: Mouchette
Short Description: A young girl living in the French countryside suffers constant indignities at the hand of alcoholism and her fellow man.

Title: Sans Soleil
Short Description: A woman narrates the contemplative writings of a seasoned world traveler, focusing on contemporary Japan.

Title: Cocaine Cowboys
Short Description: The story of how Miami became the cocaine capital of the United States in the early 1980's and the police officers who turned the tide on crime.

Title: Blind Chance
Short Description: Witek runs after a train. Three variations follow on how such a seemingly banal incident could influence the rest of Witek's life.

Title: City of Life and Death
Short Description: In 1937, Japan occupied Nanjing, the Chinese capital. There was a battle and subsequent atrocities against the inhabitants, especially those who took refuge in the International Security Zone.

Title: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
Short Description: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange note.

Title: Dear Frankie
Short Description: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

Title: Eega
Short Description: Nani loves Bindu but is killed by a jealous Sudeep, who lusts after Bindu. Nani is reincarnated as a fly and decides to avenge his death. He teams up with Bindu to make Sudeep's life a living hell.

Title: Ivan Groznyy
Short Description: During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.

Title: Diary of a Country Priest
Short Description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

Title: Raazi
Short Description: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

Title: Shall We Dance?
Short Description: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

Title: F for Fake
Short Description: A documentary about fraud and fakery.

Title: The Port of Shadows
Short Description: A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a foggy, French port city.

Title: Pelle the Conqueror
Short Description: When his wife dies, Lasse takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle, from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life.

Title: Encounters at the End of the World
Short Description: Film-maker Werner Herzog travels to the McMurdo Station in Antarctica, looking to capture the continent's beauty and investigate the characters living there.

Title: Diego Maradona
Short Description: Constructed from over 500 hours of never-before-seen footage, this documentary centers on the career of celebrated football player Diego Maradona, who played for S.S.C. Napoli in the 1980s.

Title: Bang Bang You're Dead
Short Description: Trevor is a troubled high school student, thanks to the effects of bullying. This is the story of his fight to break free.

Title: Character
Short Description: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

Title: Three Men and a Leg
Short Description: Three friends cross Italy by car in order to deliver their boss his dog and a wooden leg.

Title: Geetha Govindam
Short Description: An innocent young lecturer is misunderstood as a pervert and despised by a woman who co-incidentally turns out to be the younger sister of his brother-in-law. Eventually differences subside and love blooms between them.

Title: L'Atalante
Short Description: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

Title: Inside I'm Dancing
Short Description: When the kinetic Rory moves into his room in the Carrigmore Residential Home for the Disabled, his effect on the home is immediate. Most telling is his friendship with Michael, a young man with cerebral palsy and nearly unintelligible speech. Somehow, Rory understands Michael, and encourages him to experience life outside the confines of home.

Title: Vicky Donor
Short Description: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

Title: The Road Home
Short Description: Prompted by the death of his father and the grief of his mother, a man recalls the story of how they met in flashback.

Title: Nerkonda Paarvai
Short Description: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Title: Finding Vivian Maier
Short Description: A documentary on the late Vivian Maier, a nanny whose previously unknown cache of 100,000 photographs earned her a posthumous reputation as one of the most accomplished street photographers.

Title: Fed Up
Short Description: An examination of America's obesity epidemic and the food industry's role in aggravating it.

Title: Guru
Short Description: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

Title: Machuca
Short Description: Two 12-year-old Chilean children from different social classes become friends in 1973. They both discover each other's world as political tensions in their country increase.

Title: Magadheera
Short Description: A street-bike racer chances upon a woman and is struck by visions of a past life where they were both star-crossed lovers in a war-ridden kingdom 400 years ago, while the reincarnation of his romantic rival emerges with murderous intent.

Title: Our Hospitality
Short Description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

Title: Rock On!!
Short Description: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

Title: Swatantra Veer Savarkar
Short Description: The life journey of Indian freedom fighter and reformer Vinayak Damodar Savarkar, popularly known as Veer Savarkar.

Title: Let's Sin
Short Description: There is a murder while at prayer. Selman Bulut, the imam of mosque, starts to investigate the murder and faces with people in the neighborhood.

Title: Forks Over Knives
Short Description: Examines the profound claim that most, if not all, of the degenerative diseases that afflict us can be controlled, or even reversed, by rejecting our present menu of animal-based and processed foods.

Title: Don
Short Description: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

Title: Oceans
Short Description: An ecological drama/documentary, filmed throughout the globe. Part thriller, part meditation on the vanishing wonders of the sub-aquatic world.

Title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
Short Description: Lovinder Singh, a thief now in custody and facing trial, reflects on his life of crime while the press reflect on how he managed to get away with so much before being arrested.

Title: Kolya
Short Description: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.

Title: The Barber of Siberia
Short Description: At the turn of the century, a young Russian cadet falls in love with an American beauty, endangering his career and even their lives.

Title: Thou Gild'st the Even
Short Description: Cemal is a man who lives with his father in Akhisar town of Manisa and works in his own barber shop. Cemal, who seems to be at his own pace, is in trouble, and even he doesn't know what's going on. On the other hand, in this town where almost everyone knows each other, seemingly ordinary people have extraordinary powers.

Title: When Father Was Away on Business
Short Description: A family is deeply affected by the father's extramarital affairs and the turbulent consequences of the Tito-Stalin split.

Title: Mankatha
Short Description: Vinayak, a suspended cop, helps a group of four men rob cricket betting money amounting to 500 crores INR. When it comes to splitting the amount, betrayal hits the team hard and a chase ensues.

Title: Murderball
Short Description: Quadriplegics, who play full-contact rugby in wheelchairs, overcome unimaginable obstacles to compete in the Paralympic Games in Athens, Greece.

Title: Mahaan
Short Description: Gandhi Mahaan, a school teacher, is abandoned by his family after he decides to live a life of his own, with personal freedom.

Title: A Complete Unknown
Short Description: In 1961, an unknown 19-year-old Bob Dylan arrives in New York City with his guitar and forges relationships with musical icons on his meteoric rise, culminating in a groundbreaking performance that reverberates around the world.

Title: Wicked
Short Description: Elphaba, a misunderstood young woman because of her green skin, and Galinda, a popular girl, become friends at Shiz University in the Land of Oz. After an encounter with the Wonderful Wizard of Oz, their friendship reaches a crossroads.

Title: Deadpool & Wolverine
Short Description: Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe from extinction.

Title: The Count of Monte-Cristo
Short Description: After escaping from an island prison where he spent 14 years for being wrongly accused of state treason, Edmond Dantès returns as the Count of Monte Cristo to exact revenge on the men who betrayed him.

Title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
Short Description: As Hollywood's Golden Age is winding down during the summer of 1969, television actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double Cliff Booth endeavor to achieve lasting success in Hollywood while meeting several colorful characters along the way.

Title: Better Man
Short Description: The meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams.

Title: American Psycho
Short Description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Lost Highway
Short Description: Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Short Description: When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

Title: Moana
Short Description: In ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out Maui to set things right.

Title: Transformers One
Short Description: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but who once were friends bonded like brothers who changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Short Description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Wallace & Gromit: Vengeance Most Fowl
Short Description: Top dog Gromit springs into action to save his master when Wallace's high-tech invention goes rogue and he is framed for a series of suspicious crimes.

Title: Superbad
Short Description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Title: Watchmen
Short Description: In a version of 1985 where superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach on the trail of a conspiracy that will change the course of history.

Title: Dazed and Confused
Short Description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

Title: The Whale
Short Description: A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.

Title: Love Actually
Short Description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Title: Train to Busan
Short Description: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.
In the ancient battle of Thermopylae, King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fight against Xerxes and his massive Persian army.

Title: Anatomy of a Fall
Short Description: A woman is suspected of murder after her husband's death; their half-blind son faces a moral dilemma as the main witness.

Title: Sound of Freedom
Short Description: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from traffickers.

Title: Aftersun
Short Description: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier. Memories real and imagined fill the gaps between as she tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't.

Title: The Iron Claw
Short Description: The true story of the inseparable Von Erich brothers, who made history in the intensely competitive world of professional wrestling in the early 1980s.

Title: The Fifth Element
Short Description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

Title: All of Us Strangers
Short Description: A screenwriter drawn back to his childhood home enters into a fledgling relationship with his downstairs neighbor while discovering a mysterious new way to heal from losing his parents 30 years ago.

Title: Inside Man
Short Description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Title: Kneecap
Short Description: When fate brings Belfast teacher JJ into the orbit of self-confessed "low life scum" Naoise and Liam Óg, the needle drops on a hip hop act like no other. Rapping in their native Irish, they lead a movement to save their mother tongue.

Title: Hell or High Water
Short Description: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Fury
Short Description: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

Title: Pushpa: The Rise - Part 1
Short Description: A labourer rises through the ranks of a red sandalwood smuggling syndicate, making some powerful enemies in the process.

Title: Sanam Teri Kasam
Short Description: After being disowned by her family, an awkward librarian relies on the help of her brooding neighbour.

Title: Office Space
Short Description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

Title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Short Description: As the Clone Wars nears its end, Obi-Wan Kenobi pursues a new threat, while Anakin Skywalker is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot for galactic domination.

Title: The Reader
Short Description: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.
