Title: The Godfather Part III
Short Description: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

Title: Hundreds of Beavers
Short Description: In this 19th century, supernatural winter epic, a drunken applejack salesman must go from zero to hero and become North America's greatest fur trapper by defeating hundreds of beavers.

Title: Falling Down
Short Description: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

Title: Moulin Rouge!
Short Description: A poor Bohemian poet in 1890s Paris falls for a beautiful courtesan and nightclub star coveted by a jealous duke.

Title: RoboCop
Short Description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

Title: The Thin Red Line
Short Description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

Title: Stardust
Short Description: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

Title: The Others
Short Description: In 1945, immediately following the end of Second World War, a woman who lives with her two photosensitive children on her darkened old family estate in the Channel Islands becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

Title: Deadpool 2
Short Description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Title: End of Watch
Short Description: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy: Vol. 2
Short Description: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Title: Kick-Ass
Short Description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

Title: The Florida Project
Short Description: A single mother and the manager of a roadside motel do their utmost to maintain the innocence of a six-year-old girl's life.

Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Short Description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

Title: Gifted
Short Description: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

Title: Sherlock Holmes
Short Description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

Title: The Last of the Mohicans
Short Description: Three Mohican trappers agree to protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

Title: Minority Report
Short Description: John works with the PreCrime police which stop crimes before they take place, with the help of three 'PreCogs' who can foresee crimes. Events ensue when John finds himself framed for a future murder.

Title: Moneyball
Short Description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

Title: Saw
Short Description: Two men awaken to find themselves on the opposite sides of a dead body, each with specific instructions to kill the other or face consequences. These two are the latest victims of the Jigsaw Killer.

Title: A Star Is Born
Short Description: A hard-drinking country music star falls in love with a singer whose career quickly takes off.

Title: Only the Brave
Short Description: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

Title: The Machinist
Short Description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

Title: The Boondock Saints
Short Description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes in order to try to wipe out Boston's criminal underworld "in the name of God".

Title: Kung Fu Panda
Short Description: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

Title: Dark City
Short Description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

Title: Gone Baby Gone
Short Description: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Short Description: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

Title: Despicable Me
Short Description: Gru, a criminal mastermind, adopts three orphans as pawns to carry out the biggest heist in history. His life takes an unexpected turn when the little girls see the evildoer as their potential father.

Title: After Hours
Short Description: Ordinary word processor Paul Hackett experiences the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit Marcy, a Soho resident that he met that evening at a coffee shop.

Title: The Skin I Live In
Short Description: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

Title: The Butterfly Effect
Short Description: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

Title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
Short Description: Zak, a man with Down syndrome, runs away from a residential nursing home to pursue his dream of becoming a wrestler. Later, he meets with an outlaw who becomes his friend and coach.

Title: My Cousin Vinny
Short Description: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

Title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
Short Description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

Title: Midnight in Paris
Short Description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

Title: True Grit
Short Description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

Title: Eastern Promises
Short Description: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

Title: The Blind Side
Short Description: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

Title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
Short Description: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

Title: Traffic
Short Description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

Title: Mutiny on the Bounty
Short Description: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

Title: Dark Waters
Short Description: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

Title: Toy Story 4
Short Description: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

Title: The Fly
Short Description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Short Description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Short Description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

Title: Creed
Short Description: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

Title: Deliverance
Short Description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

Title: Romeo and Juliet
Short Description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

Title: Thelma & Louise
Short Description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two women escape for the crimes they committed.

Title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
Short Description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

Title: Mysterious Skin
Short Description: Two pre-adolescent boys both experienced a strange event and later it affects their lives in different ways. One becomes a reckless, sexually adventurous prostitute, while the other retreats into a reclusive fantasy of alien abduction.

Title: Mad Max 2
Short Description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community get rid of a horde of bandits.

Title: Cell 211
Short Description: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

Title: West Side Story
Short Description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Title: Belle de Jour
Short Description: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Short Description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

Title: The Fault in Our Stars
Short Description: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

Title: Lethal Weapon
Short Description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

Title: Lord of War
Short Description: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

Title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
Short Description: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

Title: Match Point
Short Description: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

Title: Just Mercy
Short Description: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

Title: Maurice
Short Description: Two English school chums find themselves falling in love at Cambridge. To regain his place in society, Clive gives up Maurice and marries. While staying with Clive and his wife, Maurice discovers romance in the arms of the gamekeeper Alec.

Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Short Description: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

Title: The Jungle Book
Short Description: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

Title: Bridge of Spies
Short Description: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

Title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
Short Description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

Title: The Raid
Short Description: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

Title: The Mitchells vs the Machines
Short Description: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

Title: The Royal Tenenbaums
Short Description: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

Title: Enter the Dragon
Short Description: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.

Title: Ponyo
Short Description: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

Title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
Short Description: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

Title: Searching
Short Description: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a desperate father tries to find clues on her laptop.

Title: Pinocchio
Short Description: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

Title: Tell Me Who I Am
Short Description: After losing his memory in an accident, Alex Lewis trusts his twin brother, Marcus, to tell him about his past only to discover that he's hiding a dark secret about their childhood.

Title: The Birds
Short Description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

Title: Suzume
Short Description: A modern action adventure road story where a 17-year-old girl named Suzume helps a mysterious young man close doors from the other side that are releasing disasters all over in Japan.

Title: I Am Sam
Short Description: An intellectually disabled man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

Title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
Short Description: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

Title: Leave Her to Heaven
Short Description: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married, but her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both as well as everyone around them.

Title: 25th Hour
Short Description: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

Title: Seven Pounds
Short Description: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

Title: The Two Popes
Short Description: Behind Vatican walls, the conservative Pope Benedict XVI and the liberal future Pope Francis must find common ground to forge a new path for the Catholic Church.

Title: The Bridges of Madison County
Short Description: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

Title: Escape from Alcatraz
Short Description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

Title: The Last King of Scotland
Short Description: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

Title: God's Own Country
Short Description: Spring. Yorkshire. Young farmer Johnny Saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a Romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets Johnny on a new path.

Title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
Short Description: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

Title: Kelly's Heroes
Short Description: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines in WWII France to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

Title: Barton Fink
Short Description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

Title: Rushmore
Short Description: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

Title: Robot Dreams
Short Description: The adventures and misfortunes of Dog and Robot in New York City during the 1980s.

Title: The Commitments
Short Description: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

Title: Gettysburg
Short Description: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

Title: Star Trek: First Contact
Short Description: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

Title: Run Lola Run
Short Description: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

Title: Sabrina
Short Description: After her return from school in Paris, a playboy finally takes notice of his family's chauffeur's daughter, who's long had a crush on him, but he questions his more serious brother's motives when he warns against getting involved with her.

Title: Where Eagles Dare
Short Description: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

Title: 21 Grams
Short Description: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

Title: Giant
Short Description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

Title: The Body
Short Description: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

Title: Hotel Mumbai
Short Description: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

Title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
Short Description: Against all the odds, a thirteen-year-old boy in Malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.

Title: Watership Down
Short Description: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Title: Rebel Without a Cause
Short Description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

Title: Arrietty
Short Description: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

Title: Freedom Writers
Short Description: Erin Gruwell, a young teacher in a racially divided Los Angeles school, inspires her class of at-risk students, deemed incapable of learning, to learn tolerance, apply themselves, and pursue education beyond high school.

Title: Walkabout
Short Description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

Title: Godzilla
Short Description: After a dinosaur-like beast - awoken from undersea hibernation by atom bomb testing - ravages Tokyo, a scientist must decide if his similarly dangerous weapon should be used to destroy it.

Title: The Wedding Banquet
Short Description: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

Title: Jeremiah Johnson
Short Description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

Title: A Little Princess
Short Description: Sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

Title: Mr. Church
Short Description: Unique friendship develops when a girl and her dying mother retain the services of a talented cook - Henry Joseph Church. What begins as a six month arrangement instead spans into fifteen years and creates a family bond that lasts forever.

Title: Winchester '73
Short Description: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden odyssey through the American West.

Title: Frost/Nixon
Short Description: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

Title: From Here to Eternity
Short Description: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a pugilistic private is cruelly punished for refusing to join his unit's boxing team. Meanwhile, his commanding officer's wife and top NCO are indulging in a torrid love affair.

Title: The Hurricane
Short Description: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.
The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth-century Italy as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

Title: Philomena
Short Description: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

Title: The Little Prince
Short Description: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

Title: Shelter
Short Description: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

Title: The Double Life of Véronique
Short Description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

Title: The Kite Runner
Short Description: Amir lives in California with his wife Soraya. He receives a call from his uncle Rahim Khan who urges him to travel to Afghanistan and rescue the son of Amir's childhood servant and friend, Hassan.

Title: Nashville
Short Description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

Title: The 39 Steps
Short Description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

Title: The Station Agent
Short Description: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

Title: United 93
Short Description: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Title: On Golden Pond
Short Description: Curmudgeon Norman is estranged from his daughter Chelsea. Nevertheless, at Golden Pond he and his wife agree to look after Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

Title: The Muppet Movie
Short Description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

Title: Victoria
Short Description: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

Title: Io Capitano
Short Description: A Homeric fairy tale that tells the adventurous journey of two young boys, Seydou and Moussa, who leave Dakar to reach Europe.

Title: Shane
Short Description: An ex-gunfighter defends homesteaders in 1889 Wyoming.

Title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
Short Description: A cash-strapped documentary maker decides to make his newest documentary about a mollusk shell he finds living in his Airbnb with his friends.

Title: The Wave
Short Description: A high school teacher's experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.

Title: The Color of Pomegranates
Short Description: The life of the Armenian poet Sayat-Nova, from childhood to death: his spiritual journey, artistic endeavors, and inner conflicts within the cultural and historical context of Armenia. Hailed as revolutionary by Mikhail Vartanov.

Title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
Short Description: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

Title: Gilda
Short Description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

Title: Short Cuts
Short Description: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

Title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
Short Description: Eccentric and well-meaning teacher Jean Brodie's extravagantly romantic ideas about life and love overly impress her young pupils in 1930s Edinburgh, bringing her into direct conflict with her school's conservative headmistress.

Title: Three Colors: White
Short Description: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Title: Volver
Short Description: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

Title: The Odd Couple
Short Description: A New Yorker newly separated from his wife moves in with his best friend, a divorced sportswriter, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

Title: The Social Dilemma
Short Description: Explores the dangerous human impact of social networking; tech experts sound the alarm on their own creations.

Title: Repulsion
Short Description: A withdrawn manicurist who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and experiences horrific visions of violence.

Title: The Public Enemy
Short Description: An Irish-American street punk tries to make it big in the world of organized crime.

Title: Better Days
Short Description: While she copes with the pressures of her final examinations, a bullied teenage girl forms an unlikely friendship with a mysterious young man who protects her from her assailants.

Title: A Fistful of Dynamite
Short Description: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

Title: The Taming of the Scoundrel
Short Description: A grumpy farmer in small Italy is surprised when a beautiful city girl breaks down in the rain, surprising everyone else in his town.

Title: The Invisible Man
Short Description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

Title: To Sir, with Love
Short Description: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

Title: The Pawnbroker
Short Description: A Jewish pawnbroker, victim of Nazi persecution, loses all faith in his fellow man until he realizes too late the tragedy of his actions.

Title: When Marnie Was There
Short Description: Anna, a shy 12-year-old girl, is sent to spend time with her aunt and uncle who live in the countryside, where she meets Marnie. The two become best friends. But Anna gradually discovers that Marnie is not quite who she appears to be.

Title: A Very Long Engagement
Short Description: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

Title: Leviathan
Short Description: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

Title: Seconds
Short Description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

Title: Weekend
Short Description: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.

Title: The Shootist
Short Description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

Title: Control
Short Description: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to die by suicide at the age of 23.

Title: Eyes Without a Face
Short Description: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

Title: Shine
Short Description: David Helfgott, a gifted pianist, struggles through childhood as his dysfunctional father abuses him and his siblings. Years later, he suffers a mental breakdown but manages to return as a legend.

Title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
Short Description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

Title: Victor/Victoria
Short Description: A struggling female soprano in 1934 Paris finally finds work after posing as a female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life when a visiting Chicago gangster finds himself inexplicably attracted to the seemingly male performer.

Title: Mrs. Miniver
Short Description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

Title: Peeping Tom
Short Description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

Title: Lost Horizon
Short Description: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

Title: Running on Empty
Short Description: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live his own life.

Title: Shiddat
Short Description: A passionate love story involving two couples which highlights the contrast between a regular, mature yet egoistic husband and a unique, happy go lucky, enamored, overzealous boy chasing after the love of his life.

Title: One Cut of the Dead
Short Description: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.

Title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
Short Description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

Title: Argentina, 1985
Short Description: A team of lawyers takes on the heads of Argentina's bloody military dictatorship during the 1980s in a battle against odds and a race against time.

Title: Mister Roberts
Short Description: In the waning days of World War II, the cargo officer of a Navy supply ship chafes at its role far from the action in the Pacific's backwater areas, his frustration rising when its captain denies the crew liberty over petty irritations.

Title: The Castle
Short Description: A working-class family from Melbourne, Australia fights city hall after being told they must vacate their beloved family home to allow for infrastructural expansion.

Title: The Swimmer
Short Description: A man spends a summer day swimming home via all the pools in his quiet suburban neighborhood.

Title: Häxan: Witchcraft Through the Ages
Short Description: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

Title: The Trial
Short Description: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

Title: Three Identical Strangers
Short Description: In 1980 New York, three young men who were all adopted meet each other and find out they're triplets who were separated at birth. But their quest to find out why turns into a bizarre and sinister mystery.

Title: Maudie
Short Description: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist and eventually becomes a beloved figure in the community.

Title: Down by Law
Short Description: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

Title: The Night of the Iguana
Short Description: An ostracized Episcopal clergyman leads a busload of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure haunting his life.

Title: In a Better World
Short Description: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

Title: Fearless
Short Description: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

Title: Wake in Fright
Short Description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

Title: Only Yesterday
Short Description: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

Title: Meet John Doe
Short Description: A penniless drifter is recruited by an ambitious columnist to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

Title: All That Heaven Allows
Short Description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

Title: My Life as a Dog
Short Description: In the late '50s, young Ingemar learns a lot about life and himself when he is sent away from his sick mother to live with his aunt and uncle in a town full of eccentrics.

Title: Beautiful Thing
Short Description: Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

Title: Oslo, August 31st
Short Description: One day in the life of Anders, a young recovering drug addict, who takes a brief leave from his treatment center to interview for a job and catch up with old friends in Oslo.

Title: Lifeboat
Short Description: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.

Title: Hell
Short Description: After being deported back to Mexico, a man has no choice but to join the vicious drug cartel that has corrupted his hometown in order to survive.

Title: Zorba the Greek
Short Description: A reserved English writer travelling to Crete on a matter of business finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.

Title: The Ladykillers
Short Description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

Title: The Defiant Ones
Short Description: Two chained-together escaped convicts, one White and one Black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

Title: A Summer's Tale
Short Description: As a reserved young graduate vacations in a seaside town, he hopes his girlfriend will join him. But he ends up bonding with a local young woman whose female friend is also smitten with him.

Title: Lady Snowblood
Short Description: A young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

Title: The Visitor
Short Description: A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

Title: Vera Drake
Short Description: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.

Title: The Red Violin
Short Description: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Title: A Heart in Winter
Short Description: Stéphane is an emotionally distant but professionally dedicated violin restorer whose cold heart is tested when his employer's new girlfriend, a beautiful violinist, falls for him.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Short Description: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Swordsmith Village
Short Description: Tanjiro needs to bring a definitive end to Upper Rank Six. After the dust settles, he goes with his sister Nezuko to the Swordsmith Village in search of a new sword.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

Title: Sorry We Missed You
Short Description: Hoping that self-employment through gig economy can solve their financial woes, a hard-up UK delivery driver and his wife struggling to raise a family end up trapped in the vicious circle of this modern-day form of labour exploitation.

Title: Loveless
Short Description: A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.

Title: Campanadas a medianoche
Short Description: When King Henry IV ascends to the throne, his heir, the Prince of Wales, is befriended by Sir John Falstaff, an old, overweight, fun-loving habitual liar. Through Falstaff's eyes we see the reign of King Henry IV and the rise of Henry V.

Title: Love and Death
Short Description: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

Title: Joyeux Noel
Short Description: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

Title: Mass
Short Description: The parents of both the shooter and one of the victims of a school shooting tragedy agree to meet and talk in an attempt to move forward.

Title: Boy A
Short Description: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

Title: Soldier of Orange
Short Description: During World War II, Dutch students join the resistance movement against the German occupation of the Netherlands.

Title: Les Misérables
Short Description: A cop from the provinces moves to Paris to join the Anti-Crime Brigade of Montfermeil, discovering an underworld where the tensions between the different groups mark the rhythm.

Title: Our Little Sister
Short Description: Three sisters live together in Kamakura. When their father - absent for 15 years - dies, they travel to the countryside for his funeral and meet their half-sister. Bonding quickly with the orphaned Suzu, they invite her to live with them.

Title: The Seventh Continent
Short Description: The daily routines of a seemingly ordinary Austrian family begin to take on a sinister complexion.

Title: Capturing the Friedmans
Short Description: Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middle-class Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.

Title: Mustang
Short Description: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

Title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
Short Description: A school student who conspires with his teacher and others to overthrow the Qing Dynasty sees his family slaughtered at the hands of his enemies. He joins the Shaolin Temple and rigorously studies martial arts to avenge his beloved ones.

Title: Play It Again, Sam
Short Description: A film critic obsessed with Casablanca (1942) seeks to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.

Title: Le Bonheur
Short Description: François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.

Title: Sophie Scholl: The Final Days
Short Description: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.

Title: Bloody Sunday
Short Description: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

Title: Pickup on South Street
Short Description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

Title: Gun Crazy
Short Description: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

Title: Fire of Love
Short Description: Intrepid scientists and lovers Katia and Maurice Krafft died in a volcanic explosion doing the very thing that brought them together: unraveling the mysteries of volcanoes by capturing the most explosive imagery ever recorded.

Title: Les Amants du Pont-Neuf
Short Description: Alex, who's homeless and addicted to alcohol, and Michèle, who's losing her sight, form a relationship while sleeping rough on Paris's Pont-Neuf bridge.

Title: Carandiru
Short Description: Stories of crime, revenge, love, and friendship at the Carandiru Penitentiary, the largest prison in Latin America.

Title: And Then We Danced
Short Description: A passionate coming-of-age tale set amidst the conservative confines of modern Tbilisi, the film follows Merab, a competitive dancer who is thrown off balance by the arrival of Irakli, a fellow male dancer with a rebellious streak.

Title: After Life
Short Description: After death, people have a week to choose only one memory to keep for eternity.

Title: Bad Genius
Short Description: Lynn, a brilliant student, after helping her friends to get the grades they need, develops the idea of starting a much bigger exam-cheating business.

Title: The Man Without a Past
Short Description: M arrives in Helsinki only to be viciously attacked by thugs and pronounced dead by medics. He revives but with no memory of his past or his identity. He rebuilds his life from scratch, but the past inevitably catches up with him.

Title: Le Dîner de Cons
Short Description: A few friends have a weekly fools' dinner, where each brings a fool along. Pierre finds a champion fool for next dinner. Surprise.

Title: The Blue Angel
Short Description: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

Title: The Boy and the Beast
Short Description: When a young orphaned boy living on the streets of Shibuya stumbles upon a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by a gruff warrior beast looking for an apprentice.

Title: Hamlet
Short Description: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.

Title: Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro
Short Description: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid cop struggle to free a princess from an evil count, and learn the secret of a treasure that she holds part of the key to.

Title: Highway
Short Description: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

Title: Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room
Short Description: A documentary about the Enron corporation, its faulty and corrupt business practices, and how they led to its fall.

Title: The Woman in the Window
Short Description: A reserved professor meets a model and gets mixed up in murder.

Title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
Short Description: After Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

Title: Vagabond
Short Description: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

Title: The Magnificent Ambersons
Short Description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

Title: Odd Man Out
Short Description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

Title: Last Year at Marienbad
Short Description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

Title: Bande à Part
Short Description: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

Title: Johnny Guitar
Short Description: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

Title: The Bishop's Wife
Short Description: A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.

Title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
Short Description: Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. Will Dixon's vicious nature get the better of him?

Title: Sanju
Short Description: Biopic of the controversial life of actor Sanjay Dutt: his film career, jail sentence, and personal life.

Title: Laurence Anyways
Short Description: A drama that charts ten years in a transgender woman's relationship with her lover.

Title: Moonage Daydream
Short Description: A cinematic odyssey exploring David Bowie's creative and musical journey. From visionary filmmaker Brett Morgen, and sanctioned by the Bowie estate.

Title: Zelig
Short Description: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

Title: Raanjhanaa
Short Description: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

Title: The Gospel According to Matthew
Short Description: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew. Film shows Christ as a Marxist avant-la-lettre and therefore uses half of the text of Matthew.

Title: Accattone
Short Description: A pimp with no other means to provide for himself finds his life spiraling out of control when his prostitute is sent to prison.

Title: Ghajini
Short Description: Sanjay Ramaswamy, who is suffering from short-term memory loss, sets out on a quest to find and eliminate the people responsible for his ladylove Kalpana's murder.

Title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
Short Description: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

Title: Superman II: The Richard Donner Cut
Short Description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

Title: Peppermint Candy
Short Description: Following a man's suicide, time traverses back to reveal six chapters of his life on why he committed suicide.

Title: Only Angels Have Wings
Short Description: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air-freight company is compelled to risk the lives of his pilots in order to win an important contract as a traveling American showgirl stops in town.

Title: The Pride of the Yankees
Short Description: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

Title: Buena Vista Social Club
Short Description: Aging Cuban musicians whose talents had been virtually forgotten following Castro's takeover of Cuba, are brought out of retirement by Ry Cooder, who travelled to Havana in order to bring the musicians together, resulting in triumphant performances of extraordinary music, and resurrecting the musicians' careers.

Title: Pina
Short Description: A tribute to the late German choreographer Pina Bausch, as her dancers perform her most famous creations.

Title: October
Short Description: A group of interns are going through the usual grind when suddenly an accident changes their lives. The protagonist can't get let go of it and becomes obsessed with it. What does it all lead to? Is it love or something else?

Title: Piku
Short Description: A quirky comedy about the relationship between a daughter and her aging father, whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy.

Title: Eddie Murphy: Raw
Short Description: Eddie Murphy in a stand-up performance recorded live. For an hour and a half he talks about his favourite subjects: sex and women.

Title: Pickpocket
Short Description: Michel passes the time by picking pockets, careful to never be caught despite being watched by the police. His friend Jacques may suspect, while both men may have their eyes on Jeanne, the pretty neighbor of Michel's ailing mother.

Title: My Way
Short Description: In World War II-era Korea, rival runners, one Korean (Jang Dong-gun) and one Japanese (Joe Odagiri), go to war together against the Soviets.

Title: Kedi
Short Description: A profile of an ancient city and its unique people, seen through the eyes of the most mysterious and beloved animal humans have ever known, the Cat.

Title: Dragon Ball Z: Revival Fusion
Short Description: The universe is thrown into dimensional chaos as the dead come back to life. Now Goku and Vegeta must track down the cause of this uproar.

Title: The Big Clock
Short Description: A magazine tycoon commits a murder and pins it on an innocent man, who then tries to solve the murder himself.

Title: After the Thin Man
Short Description: Private detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora are back home at last and hoping for a quiet New Year when there is a murder. The obvious suspect is his wife, Nora's cousin, Selma.

Title: Lovers of the Arctic Circle
Short Description: In Lapland's cold Arctic Circle, under the eternal midnight sun, unfavourable circumstances reunite two kindred spirits. And governed by circular motifs woven by faith and love, they must answer a pivotal question. Can they deny destiny?

Title: Control
Short Description: A tale about a strange young man, Bulcsú, the fellow inspectors on his team, all without exception likable characters, a rival ticket inspection team and racing along the tracks - and a tale about love.

Title: Mortal World
Short Description: Mermer Family lives a double life working at their family owned restaurant while being undercover assassins for an international organization. After their secret is revealed, this dysfunctional family needs to work together to survive.

Title: Cholera Street
Short Description: A young car mechanic, while in the middle of an unlikely love affair, tries to protect the people in his poor gypsy neighborhood from a gangster who terrorizes the locals.

Title: The Miracle
Short Description: N the 1960s, a new teacher arrives in a village in the interior of Turkey and discovers that there is no school. He mobilizes the residents to build a place for children and the disabled to learn.

Title: The Green Ray
Short Description: It's July, and Delphine has nowhere to go for the summer. She feels very bored and "empty", but this won't last; one day she accidently meets someone who seems to be totally made for her...

Title: Destry Rides Again
Short Description: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.

Title: The Last: Naruto the Movie
Short Description: Hinata Hyuga's younger sister has been kidnapped, so Naruto must do what he can to save her.

Title: Ponniyin Selvan
Short Description: Vandiyathevan crosses the Chola land to deliver a message from the Crown Prince Aditha Karikalan, while Kundavai attempts to establish political peace as vassals and petty chieftains plot against the throne.

Title: Jim & Andy: The Great Beyond - Featuring a Very Special, Contractually Obligated Mention of Tony Clifton
Short Description: A behind-the-scenes look at how Jim Carrey adopted the persona of idiosyncratic comedian Andy Kaufman on the set of Man on the Moon (1999).

Title: A Sun
Short Description: A family of four fractures under the weight of unmet expectations, unexpected tragedy, and uncompromising pride.

Title: Nanook of the North
Short Description: In this silent predecessor to the modern documentary, film-maker Robert J. Flaherty spends one year following the lives of Nanook and his family, Inuits living in the Arctic Circle.

Title: The Fallen Idol
Short Description: A butler working in a foreign embassy in London falls under suspicion when his wife accidentally falls to her death, the only witness being an impressionable young boy.

Title: Wake Up Sid
Short Description: The story of a lazy Mumbai college student who does absolutely nothing, with a turn of events will Sid realize his potential in this world and become a success in the fast-paced life of Mumbai.

Title: Darr
Short Description: Rahul is obsessed with Kiran and stalks her constantly. However, Rahul goes berserk when she gets engaged to Sunil, a navy officer, and he decides to forcefully claim Kiran for himself.

Title: Karwaan
Short Description: Two friends and a chirpy teenager take a road trip from Bangalore to Kochi.

Title: Three Wishes for Cinderella
Short Description: Life changes dramatically for a Czech housemaid when the family coachman gives her three magical hazelnuts.

Title: Bob the Gambler
Short Description: After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

Title: The Sea Hawk
Short Description: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for an attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills with the sword.

Title: The Passion of Anna
Short Description: A recently divorced man meets an emotionally devastated widow and they begin a love affair.

Title: Ludo
Short Description: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

Title: Delhi Belly
Short Description: Three struggling room-mates unknowingly become potential prey of a ruthless gangster.

Title: Butterfly's Tongue
Short Description: Spain, 1936. Moncho is an outcast at school but is able to form a strong bond with his outspoken teacher. When fascism arrives to Spain, his teacher is considered an enemy of the regime.

Title: Drunken Angel
Short Description: A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.

Title: Shooting Dogs
Short Description: A Catholic Priest and an English teacher get stranded in a school in Kigali during the 1994 Rwandan genocide.

Title: Bilal: A New Breed of Hero
Short Description: A thousand years ago, one boy with a dream of becoming a great warrior is abducted with his sister and taken to a land far away from home. Thrown into a world where greed and injustice rule all, Bilal finds the courage to raise his voice and make a change. Inspired by true events, this is a story of a real hero who earned his remembrance in time and history.

Title: L'insulte
Short Description: After an emotional exchange between a Lebanese Christian and a Palestinian refugee escalates, the men end up in a court case that gets national attention.

Title: Im Juli
Short Description: A young, insecure teacher embarks on a journey through Europe to Turkey, where he wants to see a woman again whom he believes to be his fate.

Title: Closely Observed Trains
Short Description: An apprentice train dispatcher looks for love while aiding his colleagues in their resistance against the Nazis.

Title: It Might Get Loud
Short Description: A documentary on the electric guitar from the point of view of three significant rock musicians: The Edge, Jimmy Page, and Jack White.

Title: Aile Arasinda
Short Description: Life of a singer, her daughter and her friends change when they meet with a divorced man.

Title: A Thursday
Short Description: Naina, a playschool teacher, takes 16 students hostage. Rattling the police and the leaders, her demands send shockwaves through the country.

Title: Madaari
Short Description: When Nirmal loses his family in a disaster caused by government corruption, he embarks on a journey seeking accountability and revenge.

Title: The Butterfly's Dream
Short Description: In a small Turkish town, two young tuberculous poets try to survive while publishing their poems. As they both fall in love, their life would never be the same.

Title: Religulous
Short Description: Bill Maher's take on the current state of world religion.

Title: Fireworks Wednesday
Short Description: On the last Wednesday before the spring solstice ushers in the Persian New Year, people set off fireworks following an ancient Zoroastrian tradition. Rouhi, spending her first day at a new job, finds herself in the midst of a different kind of fireworks -- a domestic dispute between her new boss and his wife.

Title: I've Loved You So Long
Short Description: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.

Title: Newton
Short Description: A government clerk on election duty in the conflict ridden jungle of Central India tries his best to conduct free and fair voting despite the apathy of security forces and the looming fear of guerrilla attacks by communist rebels.

Title: Baazigar
Short Description: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces the man's younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

Title: Neerja
Short Description: The story of courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on Pan Am Flight 73 in 1986 when it was hijacked by a terrorist organization.

Title: Athlete A
Short Description: Follow the Indianapolis Star reporters that broke the story about USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar's abuse and hear from gymnasts like Maggie Nichols.

Title: RBG
Short Description: The exceptional life and career of U.S. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, who has developed a breathtaking legal legacy while becoming an unexpected pop culture icon.

Title: The Twelve Tasks of Asterix
Short Description: Asterix and Obelix are tasked by Julius Caesar with accomplishing twelve impossible labors to determine the fate of their indomitable Gaulish village.

Title: Dogtown and Z-Boys
Short Description: Documentary about the pioneering 1970s Zephyr skating team.

Title: Spellbound
Short Description: Spellbound follows eight teenagers on their quest to win the 1999 National Spelling Bee.

Title: Bheeshma Parvam
Short Description: Michael helms his ancestral family in Kochi, inspiring fear and respect through his past. When a few younger members of the household find his power over their lives too aggravating, they join hands with foes to clamp down on him.

Title: Shyam Singha Roy
Short Description: Centers in the theme of reincarnation, unfolding in Kolkata and Hyderabad.

Title: The Sky Is Pink
Short Description: Based on the love story of a couple spanning 25 years and told through the lens of their spunky teenage daughter Aisha Chaudhary, who was diagnosed with pulmonary fibrosis.

Title: Madras Cafe
Short Description: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

Title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
Short Description: A documentary about the life and legend Nina Simone, an American singer, pianist, and civil rights activist labeled the "High Priestess of Soul."

Title: Hungama
Short Description: The story of a bunch of misfits whose misconception about each others backgrounds end up in a series of chaotic, yet comic outcomes.

Title: Brat 2
Short Description: Arriving in Moscow, Danila discovers Konstantin dead and he sets out to avenge his death; a journey that leads him to Chicago and a whole new experience.

Title: Who Killed the Electric Car?
Short Description: A documentary that investigates the birth and death of the electric car, as well as the role of renewable energy and sustainable living in the future.

Title: Bheja Fry
Short Description: Ranjit, who makes fun of idiots, gets completely annoyed when he invites a tax inspector and a singer to his house.

Title: O Homem que Copiava
Short Description: A Brazilian photocopier operator falls in love with a girl who lives in an opposite house and spends his evenings looking at her through his binoculars.

Title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
Short Description: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy is set in the 2nd World War torn Calcutta during the 1940s. Enter a magical world of nostalgia and 'Expect the Unexpected'.

Title: Sivaji
Short Description: A software engineer comes to India in order to serve the nation and invest in its welfare. A few corrupt officials and politicians try to stop him while he tries to do good for the poor.

Title: Muslum
Short Description: A biopic about turkish vocal artist Müslüm Gürses, drama, childhood, his life.

Title: When You're Strange
Short Description: A look at the late '60s and early '70s rock band The Doors, including rare exclusive footage.

Title: Somersault in a Coffin
Short Description: A homeless man named Mahsun survives in Istanbul's Rumelihisari by stealing cars at night and returning them clean.

Title: Sarkar
Short Description: Subhash Nagre runs a parallel government in the city where he has a cult following. When his enemies plot to murder him, his son takes charge and stands up against them.

Title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
Short Description: Nishant starts dating Charu while his roommates Rajat and Vikrant already have girlfriends in Neha and Rhea respectively. Trouble starts when the guys feel that their girlfriends are dominating them.

Title: Aamir
Short Description: A doctor of Indian origin returning to Mumbai from London is forced to participate in a terrorist plot.

Title: Side by Side
Short Description: The documentary investigates the history, process and workflow of both digital and photochemical film creation.

Title: Bhavesh Joshi
Short Description: The origin story of Bhavesh Joshi, an Indian superhero, who sets out to fulfill his slain friend's wish to clean and reform the country, by training himself to fight and wearing a mask.

Title: Indie Game: The Movie
Short Description: A documentary that follows the journeys of indie game developers as they create games and release those works, and themselves, to the world.

Title: Life in a Day
Short Description: A documentary shot by film-makers all over the world that serves as a time capsule to show future generations what it was like to be alive on the twenty-fourth of July, 2010.

Title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
Short Description: A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.

Title: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Short Description: Tanu and Manu's marriage collapses. What happens when Manu meets Tanu's lookalike Kusum - and when Tanu returns?

Title: Checkmate
Short Description: An assassin gets hired for a job that throws him in a murky pool of mishaps, eventually leading to a baffling secret.

Title: Weiner
Short Description: An examination of disgraced New York Congressman Anthony Weiner's mayoral campaign and today's political landscape.

Title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
Short Description: Ashwat Raina and his teammates arrive in Pokhran to re-conduct a confidential nuclear test, where they face challenges from the American Lacrosse satellite and local spies.

Title: GasLand
Short Description: An exploration of the fracking petroleum extraction industry and the serious environmental consequences involved.

Title: Irudhi Suttru
Short Description: The story of a former boxer who quits boxing following a fallout with the authorities over the underlying politics but goes on to coach a fisherwoman to fulfill his dream through her.

Title: Ayan
Short Description: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.

Title: Pokkiri
Short Description: Thamizh is a killer for hire with no ties and who will do any dirty job for money. He has a girlfriend who loves him but also detests his violent nature. But is Thamizh really what he purports to be?

Title: Khaleja
Short Description: When a mysterious illness ravages a remote village, the villagers embrace a reluctant taxi driver as their savior.

Title: Free to Play
Short Description: Follow three professional video game players as they overcome personal adversity, family pressures, and the realities of life to compete in a $1,000,000 tournament that could change their lives forever.

Title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
Short Description: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

Title: Inside Out 2
Short Description: A sequel that features Riley entering puberty and experiencing brand new, more complex emotions as a result. As Riley tries to adapt to her teenage years, her old emotions try to adapt to the possibility of being replaced.

Title: Eyes Wide Shut
Short Description: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

Title: 28 Days Later
Short Description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the United Kingdom, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

Title: The Greatest Showman
Short Description: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

Title: Nr. 24
Short Description: Young apprentice Gunnar Sønsteby from Rjukan decides to resist Nazi-Germany on the day of the invasion to later become the leader of the "Oslo-gang" carrying out countless daring acts of sabotage making him Norway's greatest war hero.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Short Description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Blow
Short Description: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

Title: The Town
Short Description: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold the manager hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her.

Title: Beetlejuice
Short Description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

Title: Les Misérables
Short Description: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who, for decades, has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

Title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
Short Description: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

Title: The Conjuring
Short Description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

Title: The Covenant
Short Description: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: Little Children
Short Description: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Massachusetts.

Title: Baby Driver
Short Description: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love, and freedom.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Short Description: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
Short Description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Short Description: In 1935, Indiana Jones is tasked by Indian villagers with reclaiming a rock stolen from them by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

Title: The Devil's Advocate
Short Description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

Title: Total Recall
Short Description: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?

Title: Erin Brockovich
Short Description: A flamboyant law firm secretary works tirelessly to gain justice for a small town wrecked by a utility company's pollution.

Title: Promising Young Woman
Short Description: Nothing in Cassie's life is what it appears to be - she's wickedly smart, tantalizingly cunning, and she's living a secret double life. Now, an unexpected encounter is about to give Cassie a chance to right the wrongs from the past.

Title: The Fabelmans
Short Description: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.

Title: A Quiet Place
Short Description: A family struggles for survival in a world invaded by blind alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Short Description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

Title: Jackie Brown
Short Description: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the ATF for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the illegal arms dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

Title: Batman
Short Description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Title: American Fiction
Short Description: A novelist who's fed up with the establishment profiting from Black entertainment uses a pen name to write a book that propels him into the heart of the hypocrisy and madness he claims to disdain.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Short Description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Spider-Man 2
Short Description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a former brilliant scientist named Otto Octavius.

Title: Gangs of New York
Short Description: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher; his father's killer.

Title: Kill
Short Description: During a train trip to New Delhi, a pair of commandos face an army of invading bandits.

Title: Upgrade
Short Description: Set in the near-future, technology controls nearly all aspects of life. But when the world of Grey, a self-labeled technophobe, is turned upside down, his only hope for revenge is an experimental computer chip implant.

Title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
Short Description: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

Title: The Crow
Short Description: The night before his wedding, musician Eric Draven and his fiancée are brutally murdered by members of a violent gang. On the anniversary of their death, Eric rises from the grave and assumes the mantle of the Crow, a supernatural avenger.

Title: The Hunt for Red October
Short Description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain violates orders and heads for the U.S. in a new undetectable sub. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

Title: Munich
Short Description: After the Black September capture and massacre of Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympics, five men are chosen to eliminate the people responsible for that fateful day.

Title: The Impossible
Short Description: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

Title: Waves
Short Description: Traces the journey of a suburban family - led by a well-intentioned but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness, and coming together in the aftermath of a loss.

Title: The Piano Teacher
Short Description: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

Title: Sleepers
Short Description: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

Title: Doctor Strange
Short Description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Title: One Life
Short Description: Sir Nicholas 'Nicky' Winton, a young London broker who, in the months leading up to World War II, rescued over 600 children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia.

Title: The Aviator
Short Description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

Title: The Favourite
Short Description: In early 18th-century England, the status quo at the court is upset when a new servant arrives and endears herself to a frail Queen Anne.

Title: A Time to Kill
Short Description: A young Mississippi lawyer defends a black man who killed the two white men that raped his preteen daughter.

Title: Trading Places
Short Description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

Title: I, Tonya
Short Description: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

Title: The Warriors
Short Description: A street gang known as the Warriors must fight its way from the Bronx to its home turf on Coney Island when its members are falsely accused of assassinating a respected gang leader.

Title: Contact
Short Description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

Title: Ice Age
