Short Description: Manny the mammoth, Sid the loquacious sloth, and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger go on a comical quest to return a human baby back to his father, across a world on the brink of an ice age.

Title: Zombieland
Short Description: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

Title: BlacKkKlansman
Short Description: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, Colorado, successfully infiltrates the local Ku Klux Klan branch aided by a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

Title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
Short Description: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

Title: Collateral
Short Description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

Title: Battle Royale
Short Description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill one another under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

Title: The Hurt Locker
Short Description: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Title: An American Werewolf in London
Short Description: American college students David Kessler and Jack Goodman on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists. Jack dies. David recovers in a hospital, where he has nightmares.

Title: Brooklyn
Short Description: An Irish immigrant lands in 1950s Brooklyn, where she quickly falls into a romance with a local. When her past catches up with her, however, she must choose between two countries and the lives that exist within.

Title: The Abyss
Short Description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Title: Young Woman and the Sea
Short Description: The story of competitive swimmer Gertrude Ederle, who, in 1926, was the first woman to ever swim across the English Channel.

Title: The Incredibles 2
Short Description: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

Title: Lone Survivor
Short Description: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

Title: Leaving Las Vegas
Short Description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

Title: Lolita
Short Description: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a 14-year-old girl.

Title: Dinner in America
Short Description: An on-the-lam punk rocker and a young woman obsessed with his band unexpectedly fall in love and go on an epic journey together through America's decaying Midwestern suburbs.

Title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Short Description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Title: Source Code
Short Description: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.

Title: Funny Games
Short Description: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

Title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
Short Description: Several different motorists witness a single car crash in the California desert and, after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, turn against each other in a mad dash across the state to get to it.

Title: Hugo
Short Description: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

Title: A Fish Called Wanda
Short Description: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool the very proper barrister Archibald Leach.

Title: Sideways
Short Description: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

Title: Babel
Short Description: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, which jump starts an interlocking story involving four different families.

Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Short Description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Title: Doubt
Short Description: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

Title: Enemy at the Gates
Short Description: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

Title: The Piano
Short Description: In the mid-19th century a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a farmer, but is soon lusted after by a farm worker.

Title: Back to the Future Part III
Short Description: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Short Description: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
Short Description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.
In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

Title: Cure
Short Description: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

Title: 127 Hours
Short Description: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

Title: tick, tick... BOOM!
Short Description: On the brink of turning 30, a promising theater composer navigates love, friendship and the pressure to create something great before time runs out.

Title: Stranger Than Fiction
Short Description: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds his mundane Chicago life to be the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire existence, from his work to his love life to his death.

Title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
Short Description: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

Title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
Short Description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

Title: Christiane F.
Short Description: A teen girl in 1970s Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

Title: El Dorado
Short Description: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher who's trying to steal their water.

Title: The Illusionist
Short Description: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

Title: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
Short Description: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

Title: The Wicker Man
Short Description: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

Title: Twin Peaks: The Missing Pieces
Short Description: Twin Peaks before Twin Peaks (1990) and at the same time not always and entirely in the same place as Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992). A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

Title: Secondhand Lions
Short Description: Fourteen-year-old Walter Caldwell's irresponsible mother Mae sends him to live with his bachelor uncles, Hub and Garth, so that she can go on yet another husband-hunting trip.

Title: Robin Hood
Short Description: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

Title: Fallen Angels
Short Description: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

Title: Dead Man's Shoes
Short Description: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

Title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
Short Description: Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Title: The Hate U Give
Short Description: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressure from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.

Title: Richard Jewell
Short Description: Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.

Title: Field of Dreams
Short Description: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

Title: Miracle
Short Description: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

Title: Riders of Justice
Short Description: Markus goes home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a train crash. All appears to be a tragic accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.

Title: Synecdoche, New York
Short Description: A theater director struggles with his work and the women in his life as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

Title: Lust, Caution
Short Description: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

Title: The Hours
Short Description: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

Title: Blood Simple
Short Description: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

Title: Grindhouse
Short Description: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the '60s and '70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

Title: Menace II Society
Short Description: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

Title: Drive My Car
Short Description: A renowned stage actor and director learns to cope with a big personal loss when he receives an offer to direct a production of Uncle Vanya in Hiroshima.

Title: King Richard
Short Description: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard.

Title: Midnight Express
Short Description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

Title: Best in Show
Short Description: A behind-the-scenes look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.

Title: Braindead
Short Description: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

Title: A Single Man
Short Description: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

Title: Love, Simon
Short Description: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.

Title: The Book Thief
Short Description: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being protected by her adoptive parents.

Title: The Great Debaters
Short Description: A drama based on the true story of Melvin B. Tolson, a professor at Wiley College Texas. In 1935, he inspired students to form the school's first debate team, which went on to challenge Harvard in the national championship.

Title: Fruitvale Station
Short Description: The story of Oscar Grant III, a 22-year-old Bay Area resident, who crosses paths with friends, enemies, family, and strangers on the last day of 2008.

Title: Rudy
Short Description: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

Title: Pinocchio
Short Description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Title: The Player
Short Description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

Title: Sophie's Choice
Short Description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Title: A Simple Plan
Short Description: Two brothers and a friend, all blue-collar workers, come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Title: Forbidden Planet
Short Description: A starship crew in the 23rd century goes to investigate the silence of a distant planet's colony, only to find just two survivors, a powerful robot, and the deadly secret of a lost civilization.

Title: The Last Temptation of Christ
Short Description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

Title: Midnight Run
Short Description: A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss after jumping bail.

Title: The City of Lost Children
Short Description: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

Title: The Omen
Short Description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

Title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
Short Description: At an opulent gourmet restaurant, a woman carries on an affair with deadly consequences.

Title: Boiling Point
Short Description: Enter the relentless pressure of a restaurant kitchen as a head chef wrangles his team on the busiest day of the year.

Title: Spellbound
Short Description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

Title: Still Alice
Short Description: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

Title: The Man Who Wasn't There
Short Description: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

Title: Pleasantville
Short Description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.

Title: The Sand Pebbles
Short Description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Short Description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

Title: Pain and Glory
Short Description: A film director reflects on the choices he's made in life as the past and present come crashing down around him.

Title: Thank You for Smoking
Short Description: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year-old son.

Title: Nimona
Short Description: When a knight in a futuristic medieval world is framed for a crime he didn't commit, the only one who can help him prove his innocence is Nimona -- a mischievous teen who happens to be a shapeshifting creature he's sworn to destroy.

Title: Redline
Short Description: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

Title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
Short Description: Neal Oliver, a very confused young artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway that doesn't exist on any map, going to places he's never heard of, searching for an answer and his dream girl.

Title: The Guns of Navarone
Short Description: A team of Allied saboteurs is assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

Title: Clouds
Short Description: Based on real events, a young musician discovers his cancer has spread, leaving him just a few months to live. With limited time, he follows his dream and makes an album, unaware that it will soon be a viral music phenomenon.

Title: Boys Don't Cry
Short Description: A young transgender man named Brandon navigates love, life, and trying to pass as a boy in rural Nebraska.

Title: The Big Sick
Short Description: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

Title: The Mauritanian
Short Description: Mohamedou Ould Slahi fights for freedom after being detained and imprisoned without charge by the U.S. Government for years.

Title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
Short Description: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

Title: Selma
Short Description: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

Title: The Life of David Gale
Short Description: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

Title: A Perfect World
Short Description: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor, an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search for him continues.

Title: Dead Man
Short Description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange Native American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

Title: A Bittersweet Life
Short Description: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't follow his boss's orders.

Title: Hair
Short Description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

Title: Jeanne Dielman, 23, quai du commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
Short Description: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet, but something happens that changes her safe routine.

Title: The Producers
Short Description: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

Title: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
Short Description: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

Title: The Time Machine
Short Description: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Title: The Secret of N-I-M-H
Short Description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Short Description: Londoner Dorian Gray stays young, but his portrait ages.

Title: The Long Goodbye
Short Description: Private eye Philip Marlowe helps friend Terry Lennox out of a jam and is implicated in his wife Sylvia's murder. He also is hired by Eileen Wade to locate her dipsomaniac husband Roger, who frequently disappears when he wants to dry out.

Title: The Fisher King
Short Description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

Title: Lady Vengeance
Short Description: After being wrongfully imprisoned for thirteen years and having her child taken away from her, a woman seeks revenge through increasingly brutal means.

Title: Weathering with You
Short Description: Set during a period of exceptionally rainy weather, high-school boy Hodaka Morishima runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo and befriends an orphan girl who can manipulate the weather.

Title: Withnail & I
Short Description: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

Title: Saving Mr. Banks
Short Description: P. L. Travers, a London author who is financially broke, visits Los Angeles to meet Walt Disney, who is keen to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the cinema. However, his methods do not meet her approval.

Title: The Big Blue
Short Description: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

Title: The Farewell
Short Description: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

Title: Forgotten Love
Short Description: A once-respected surgeon professor Rafal Wilczur who's lost his family and his memory gets a chance at redemption when he reconnects with someone from his forgotten past who can help him find the answers he needs.

Title: A Royal Affair
Short Description: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.

Title: All About Lily Chou-Chou
Short Description: The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.

Title: Chaplin
Short Description: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

Title: Dead Man Walking
Short Description: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

Title: Tell No One
Short Description: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

Title: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
Short Description: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

Title: Hunger
Short Description: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

Title: Mars Express
Short Description: Set in the 23rd century on Mars, the plot follows the investigation on a murder case carried out by the couple formed by private investigator Aline Ruby and her android companion Carlos Rivera.

Title: Police Story
Short Description: A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

Title: The Beasts
Short Description: An expatriate French couple operate an organic farm in the Spanish countryside but clash with villagers.

Title: The Long Good Friday
Short Description: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

Title: Flickering Lights
Short Description: A gang of 4 Danish criminals are ordered by Færingen to steal a bag from a safe. When they see DKK4,000,000 in the bag, they keep it for themselves and head for Spain. They end up in a ruin of an old restaurant on Jutland and renovate it.

Title: Milk
Short Description: The story of American gay activist Harvey Milk, who fought for gay rights and was elected as California's first openly gay official.

Title: Quiz Show
Short Description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Title: The Tenant
Short Description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

Title: Little Big Man
Short Description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

Title: The Guilty
Short Description: A police officer assigned alarm dispatch duty enters a race against time when he answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman.

Title: Death Note
Short Description: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

Title: Miss Sloane
Short Description: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

Title: 5 Centimeters per Second
Short Description: Told in three interconnected segments, Takaki tells the story of his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

Title: The Flowers of War
Short Description: An American finds refuge during the 1937 Japanese invasion of Nanking in a church with a group of women. Posing as a priest, he attempts to lead the women to safety.

Title: Stalingrad
Short Description: The story follows a group of German soldiers, from their Italian R&R in the summer of 1942 to the frozen steppes of Soviet Russia and ending with the battle for Stalingrad.

Title: 13 Assassins
Short Description: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: Freier Fall
Short Description: A soon-to-be-father policeman falls for a gay fellow officer and his life starts falling apart.

Title: Deep Red
Short Description: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

Title: Cold War
Short Description: In the 1950s, a music director falls in love with a singer and tries to persuade her to flee communist Poland for France.

Title: House of Sand and Fog
Short Description: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

Title: La Vie En Rose
Short Description: Biopic of the iconic French singer Édith Piaf. Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

Title: Henry V
Short Description: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

Title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
Short Description: Instead of coming in from the Cold War, British agent Alec Leamas chooses to face another mission.

Title: Delicatessen
Short Description: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

Title: The Passenger
Short Description: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

Title: Headhunters
Short Description: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

Title: Memories
Short Description: Three separate science-fiction stories by three prominent Japanese animators.

Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Short Description: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

Title: Murder, My Sweet
Short Description: After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

Title: House of Flying Daggers
Short Description: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

Title: Santa Sangre
Short Description: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".

Title: The Meaning of Life
Short Description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

Title: A Hard Day's Night
Short Description: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

Title: A Star Is Born
Short Description: In George Cukor's remake, fading matinee idol Norman Maine helps young singer and actress Esther Blodgett find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

Title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
Short Description: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

Title: Meet Me In St. Louis
Short Description: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

Title: White Christmas
Short Description: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

Title: Grey Gardens
Short Description: Meet a mother and daughter, high-society dropouts, reclusive cousins of Jackie O., managing to thrive together amid the decay and disorder of their East Hampton, NY, mansion, making for an eerily ramshackle echo of the American Camelot.

Title: Show Me Love
Short Description: Two teenage girls in small-town Sweden. Elin is beautiful, popular, and bored with life. Agnes is friendless, sad, and secretly in love with Elin.

Title: New World
Short Description: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

Title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
Short Description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

Title: You Can Count on Me
Short Description: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

Title: The Last Detail
Short Description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Short Description: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

Title: Stree
Short Description: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

Title: Wings
Short Description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

Title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
Short Description: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

Title: Tyrannosaur
Short Description: Joseph, a man plagued by violence and a rage that is driving him to self-destruction, earns a chance of redemption that appears in the form of Hannah, a Christian charity shop worker.

Title: Sin Nombre
Short Description: A young Honduran girl and a Mexican gangster are united in a journey across the U.S. border.

Title: Drunken Master II
Short Description: A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.

Title: Instructions Not Included
Short Description: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.

Title: Europa
Short Description: Just after World War II, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

Title: The Lady from Shanghai
Short Description: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

Title: The Secret of Kells
Short Description: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

Title: Boy
Short Description: Boy, an 11-year-old child and devout Michael Jackson fan who lives on the east coast of New Zealand in 1984, gets a chance to know his absentee criminal father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.

Title: Kiss Me Deadly
Short Description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Short Description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

Title: The Imposter
Short Description: A documentary centered on a young man in Spain who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

Title: How to Steal a Million
Short Description: The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.

Title: Scum
Short Description: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the '70s.

Title: Hour of the Wolf
Short Description: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

Title: Ip Man 2
Short Description: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

Title: The Red Turtle
Short Description: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a big red turtle, which changes his life.

Title: Living in Oblivion
Short Description: This ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers takes place during one day on the set of a non-budget movie.

Title: Love Me If You Dare
Short Description: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

Title: The Collector
Short Description: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.

Title: Summer with Monika
Short Description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

Title: The Counterfeiters
Short Description: The story of the Operation Bernhard, the largest counterfeiting operation in history, carried out by Germany during World War II.

Title: Lenny
Short Description: The story of acerbic 1960s comic Lenny Bruce, whose groundbreaking, no-holds-barred style and social commentary was often deemed by the Establishment as too obscene for the public.

Title: The Flight of the Phoenix
Short Description: After an oil company plane crashes in the Sahara, the survivors' hopes are buoyed by one of the passengers, an airplane designer who comes up with a plan to build a flyable plane from the wreckage.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Short Description: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.

Title: Disconnect
Short Description: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

Title: The Damned United
Short Description: The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

Title: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
Short Description: A troubled fashion designer strikes up a romance with a much younger woman.

Title: Whale Rider
Short Description: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

Title: Coal Miner's Daughter
Short Description: The fictionalized life of singer Loretta Lynn, a girl who rose from humble beginnings to become a country music star in the 1960s/70s.

Title: Happy as Lazzaro
Short Description: An unceasingly kind Italian peasant and his family are blatantly exploited by a tobacco baroness.

Title: Brute Force
Short Description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

Title: Suddenly, Last Summer
Short Description: A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.

Title: Fresh
Short Description: Death and violence anger a twelve-year-old drug courier, who sets his employers against each other.

Title: Stolen Kisses
Short Description: After being discharged from the army, Antoine Doinel centers a screwball comedy where he applies for different jobs and tries to make sense of his relationships with women.

Title: Blue Collar
Short Description: When three automotive factory workers who're struggling financially try to steal from their own labor union, they discover corruption, and reluctantly decide to use this information for blackmail.

Title: Balloon
Short Description: East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them.

Title: Sunshine
Short Description: The fate of a Hungarian Jewish family throughout the 20th century.

Title: Dearest Love
Short Description: As France is nearing the end of the first Indochina War, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself torn between a rebellious urge to discover love, and the ever-present, almost dominating affection of his beloved mother.

Title: Tickled
Short Description: Journalist David Farrier stumbles upon a mysterious tickling competition online. As he delves deeper he comes up against fierce resistance, but that doesn't stop him getting to the bottom of a story stranger than fiction.

Title: Dead of Night
Short Description: Guests at an English estate recall nightmares.

Title: On Body and Soul
Short Description: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

Title: All or Nothing
Short Description: In a poor working class London home, Penny's love for her partner, taxi driver Phil, has run dry. When an unexpected tragedy occurs, they and their local community are brought back together.

Title: Remember
Short Description: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person he believes to be responsible for the death of his family in the death camp to kill him himself.

Title: Fahrenheit 9/11
Short Description: Michael Moore's view on what happened to the United States after 9/11 and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
Short Description: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.

Title: Lilies of the Field
Short Description: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

Title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
Short Description: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.

Title: Frantz
Short Description: In the aftermath of WWI, a young German who grieves the death of her fiancé in France meets a mysterious Frenchman who visits the fiancé's grave to lay flowers.

Title: Sonatine
Short Description: Several yakuza from Tokyo are sent to Okinawa to help end a gang war. The war then escalates and the Tokyo drifters decide to lay low at the beach.

Title: High Sierra
Short Description: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

Title: Ratcatcher
Short Description: A naïve young lad navigates the dirty squalid streets of 1973 Glasgow and the poor youth around him.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
Short Description: A lone sellsword named Guts gets recruited into a mercenary band and attempts to help the Band's leader, Griffith, on his rise to power.

Title: Cyrano de Bergerac
Short Description: Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.

Title: Chup - The Revenge of an Artist
Short Description: A lonesome florist with a new-found love interest and a psychopath killer who targets film critics in Mumbai. Are the two related? Inspector Arvind Mathur and Dr. Zenobia are about to find out.

Title: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
Short Description: The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organization set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

Title: The Naked City
Short Description: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

Title: La Cérémonie
Short Description: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

Title: Wheel of Fortune and Fantasy
Short Description: An unexpected love triangle, a failed seduction trap and an encounter that results from a misunderstanding, told in three movements to depict three female characters and trace the trajectories between their choices and regrets.

Title: A Man and a Woman
Short Description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

Title: A Hero
Short Description: Rahim is in prison because of a debt he was unable to repay. During a two-day leave, he tries to convince his creditor to withdraw his complaint against the payment of part of the sum. But things don't go as planned.

Title: Mystery Train
Short Description: Three stories are connected by a Memphis hotel and the spirit of Elvis Presley.

Title: The Namesake
Short Description: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

Title: Charley Varrick
Short Description: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

Title: Tokyo Sonata
Short Description: An ordinary Japanese family slowly disintegrates after its patriarch loses his job at a prominent company.

Title: Kirikou and the Sorceress
Short Description: Kirikou, an unusual little boy, must search the wisdom of the forbidden mountain in order to save his village from a spell cast by the evil sorceress Karaba

Title: Lucifer
Short Description: A political Godfather dies and a lot of thieves dressed up as politicians took over the rule. Question arises regarding the successor of the God, unfolding few names, along with the God's most beloved angel, Lucifer.

Title: Open Hearts
Short Description: A Dogme film about an engaged couple that is torn apart after the man is paralyzed in an accident, and the woman falls in love with the husband of the woman who caused the accident.

Title: Devdas
Short Description: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: Fist of Legend
Short Description: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

Title: Uzak
Short Description: After his wife leaves him, a photographer has an existential crisis and tries to cope with his cousin's visit.

Title: Dark Passage
Short Description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

Title: Tekkonkinkreet
Short Description: Two boys defend Treasure Town and Yakuza try to take over and clear it for new development.

Title: Rurouni Kenshin: Kyoto Inferno
Short Description: Kenshin Himura goes up against pure evil Makoto Shishio who is attempting to overthrow the Meiji government. The fate of the country hangs in the balance as Kenshin Himura takes up the sword that he vowed to never draw again.

Title: The Consequences of Love
Short Description: An introverted man's life changes completely when he finds himself attracted to a young barmaid.

Title: Revanche
Short Description: Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.

Title: Born Yesterday
Short Description: While in Washington to lobby for favorable legislation, a garbage tycoon hires a reporter to teach his ex-showgirl mistress proper etiquette to better fit in with high society, but she ends up learning more than he bargained for.

Title: Europa Europa
Short Description: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

Title: Away from Her
Short Description: A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, Aubrey, a wheelchair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home.

Title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Legend Ends
Short Description: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.

Title: Sahara
Short Description: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

Title: Iron Monkey
Short Description: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

Title: I Lost My Body
Short Description: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

Title: Burning Days
Short Description: Emre, a young prosecutor newly appointed to the small town of Yaniklar, finds himself being pulled into a political conflict during his first criminal investigation.

Title: Husbands and Wives
Short Description: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Short Description: Tanhaji Malusare, a military chieftain in the army of the Maratha king Shivaji, leads the charge to capture the strategically important Kondhana fort guarded by the army of the fierce Rajput chieftain Udaybhan Rathod.

Title: 10 Rillington Place
Short Description: What happened to the women at 10 Rillington Place? The story of British serial killer John Christie, who committed most or all of his crimes in the titular terraced house, and the miscarriage of justice involving Timothy Evans.

Title: The Nun's Story
Short Description: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, disappointment, and World War II.

Title: Dil Se..
Short Description: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

Title: Brothers
Short Description: Two brothers must negotiate changing roles and shifting family dynamics when one is sent to war in Afghanistan.

Title: March of the Penguins
Short Description: In the Antarctic, every March since the beginning of time, the quest begins to find the perfect mate and start a family.

Title: Wadjda
Short Description: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.

Title: As It Is in Heaven
Short Description: A famous international conductor returns to his small childhood town in Sweden for early retirement. He's asked to help with the church choir. He affects the lives of all in the choir.

Title: The Mark of Zorro
Short Description: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

Title: The Palm Beach Story
Short Description: A New York inventor needs cash to develop his big idea, so his adoring wife decides to raise it by divorcing him and marrying an eccentric Florida millionaire with a capricious high-society sister.

Title: Songs from the Second Floor
Short Description: Where are we humans going? A film poem inspired by the Peruvian poet César Vallejo. We meet people in the city. People trying to communicate, searching compassion and get the connection of small and large things.

Title: Swing Time
Short Description: Roguish gambler/dancer "Lucky" Garnett is challenged by his fiance's father to come up with $25,000 to prove he's worthy of her hand. But after he falls in love with a dance instructor, Lucky'll do anything to keep from earning the bucks.

Title: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
Short Description: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.

Title: Red Cliff II
Short Description: Second and final part of epic tale about a legendary battle that changed the course of China history.

Title: Scrooge
Short Description: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Title: Lonely Are the Brave
Short Description: A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.

Title: The Match Factory Girl
Short Description: A woman's terribly dull life is upended by a one-night stand pregnancy, causing her to seek retribution.

Title: And Now for Something Completely Different
Short Description: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969).

Title: Ghoomer
Short Description: Anina, a young woman batting prodigy, loses her right hand in an unfortunate accident on the eve of her international cricketing debut. An unsympathetic, failed, and frustrated cricketer enters her life, gives her a new dream, and transforms her fate with the most innovative training, making her play for the Indian cricket team again, but this time as a bowler. Ghoomer is the new style of bowling they invent to bamboozle the opposition.

Title: Golmaal Fun Unlimited
Short Description: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.

Title: The Lavender Hill Mob
Short Description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

Title: The Desperate Hours
Short Description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

Title: Birds of Passage
Short Description: During the marijuana bonanza, a violent decade that saw the origins of drug trafficking in Colombia, Rapayet and his indigenous family get involved in a war to control the business that ends up destroying their lives and their culture.

Title: Custody
Short Description: A broken marriage leads to a bitter custody battle with an embattled son at the centre.

Title: La noche de 12 años
Short Description: 1973. Uruguay is governed by a military dictatorship. One autumn night, three Tupamaro prisoners are taken from their jail cells in a secret military operation. The order is precise: "As we can't kill them, let's drive them mad."

Title: Alexander Nevsky
Short Description: The story of how a great Russian prince led a ragtag army to battle an invading force of Teutonic Knights.

Title: Omar
Short Description: A young Palestinian freedom fighter agrees to work as an informant after he's tricked into an admission of guilt by association in the wake of an Israeli soldier's killing.

Title: Val
Short Description: A documentary centering on the daily life of actor Val Kilmer, featuring never-before-seen footage spanning 40 years.

Title: Jodhaa Akbar
Short Description: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

Title: Secret Sunshine
Short Description: A woman moves to the town where her dead husband was born. As she tries to fit in, another tragic event overturns her life.

Title: You Are the Apple of My Eye
Short Description: A group of close friends who attend a private school all have a debilitating crush on the sunny star pupil, Shen Jiayi. The only member of the group who claims not to is Ke Jingteng, but he ends up loving her as well.

Title: Claire's Knee
Short Description: On lakeside summer holiday, a conflicted older man is dared to have a flirt with two beautiful teenage half-sisters despite his betrothal to a diplomat's daughter and the fact that the girls have boyfriends.

Title: Jolly LLB
Short Description: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.

Title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun...!
Short Description: Prem and Nisha meet and fall in love at the wedding of their elder siblings, but their plans to be together are put in jeopardy when Nisha's sister dies, leaving behind a baby.

Title: Where to Invade Next
Short Description: To learn what the USA can learn from other nations, Michael Moore playfully "invades" them to see what they have to offer.

Title: The Girl on the Bridge
Short Description: One night, a fading entertainer intervenes when a woman contemplates suicide, beginning a strange, unpredictable relationship.

Title: Submarino
Short Description: Two brothers meet at their mother's funeral, each in his way on a path of self-destruction, both haunted by a tragedy in their youth.

Title: The Barbarian Invasions
Short Description: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.

Title: Nowhere in Africa
Short Description: Due to Hitler's threat, Walter Redlich, a Jewish lawyer, immigrates to Kenya with his wife Jettel and daughter Regina. Things take a turn when the family is ordered to move by the British officers.

Title: The Concert
Short Description: Thirty years ago Bolshoi Orchestra conductor Andreï Filipov was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a lowly janitor, an opportunity arises to gather his old musicians to go and pose as the official Bolshoi orchestra in Paris.

Title: The Mountain
Short Description: The heroic story of two soldiers trapped in an ambush, fighting for their lives.

Title: Bullet in the Head
Short Description: When three close friends escape from Hong Kong to war-time Saigon to start a criminal's life, they all go through a harrowing experience which totally shatters their lives and their friendship forever.

Title: The Navigator
Short Description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

Title: Stories We Tell
Short Description: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

Title: Trapped
Short Description: A man struggles to survive after he unintentionally locks himself up in a high rise devoid of food, water and electricity.
Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.

Title: Elling
Short Description: When his mother, who has sheltered him his entire 40 years, dies, sensitive would-be poet Elling is sent to live in a state institution. There he meets Kjell Bjarne, a gentle giant and woman-obsessed virgin in his 40s. After two years, the men are released and provided with a state-funded apartment and stipend with the hope they will be able to live on their own. Initially, the simple act of going around the corner for groceries is a challenge. Through a friendship born of desperate dependence, the skittish Elling and the boisterous, would-be ladies' man Kjell Bjarne discover that not only can they survive on the outside--they can thrive. But as their courage grows, they find oddball ways to cope with society and strike up friendships in the unlikeliest places.

Title: The Petrified Forest
Short Description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

Title: Mersal
Short Description: A police officer arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

Title: Sarah's Key
Short Description: In modern-day Paris, a journalist finds her life becoming entwined with a young girl whose family was torn apart during the notorious Vel' d'Hiv Roundup in 1942.

Title: The Letter
Short Description: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter written in her own hand may prove her undoing.

Title: Land and Freedom
Short Description: David is an unemployed communist that comes to Spain in 1937 during the civil war to enroll the republicans and defend the democracy against the fascists. He makes friends between the soldiers.

Title: Roger & Me
Short Description: After General Motors closes its factory in Flint, Michigan, eliminating 35,000 jobs, filmmaker Michael Moore undertakes a quixotic quest to interview General Motors' chairman, Roger B. Smith.

Title: Sidewalls
Short Description: Martín and Mariana are slightly damaged people who live in buildings just opposite one another. While they often don't notice each other, separation might be the very thing that brings them together.

Title: A Day at the Races
Short Description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor teams with a singer and his friends as they struggle to save an upstate New York sanitarium with the help of a misfit racehorse.

Title: A Pure Formality
Short Description: Onoff is a famous writer who hasn't published any new books for quite some time and has become a recluse. When he is picked up by the police one stormy night, without any identification, out of breath and running madly, without clear memory of recent events, the Inspector is suspicious.

Title: Life Is a Miracle
Short Description: What could be better for the village than a scenic railway to bring in the tourists? What could be worse for tourism than war? Luka builds the railway and shuts his eyes to war. Then Luka's wife runs off with a musician and his son is called up to the army. Luka's life is a war zone. Then he meets Sabaha..

Title: The Magician
Short Description: A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their capture, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.

Title: Beyond the Hills
Short Description: The friendship between two young women who grew up in the same orphanage; one has found refuge at a convent in Romania and refuses to leave with her friend, who now lives in Germany.

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Short Description: Set in the small-town of Bareilly, Bitti is a free-spirited young girl who lives life on her own terms and refuses to be pressured into getting married. Her life takes a shift when she meets Chirag Dubey and Pritam Vidrohi.

Title: OMG 2
Short Description: An unhappy civilian asks the court to mandate comprehensive education in schools in a dramatic yet amusing courtroom play.

Title: Get Real
Short Description: A tenderly romantic coming-of-age story as two boys in a British school fall in love.

Title: The Class
Short Description: Teacher and novelist François Bégaudeau plays a version of himself as he negotiates a year with his racially mixed students from a tough Parisian neighborhood.

Title: The Distinguished Citizen
Short Description: A winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature, who has been living in Europe for decades, accepts an invitation to receive another award. In Argentina he finds both similarities and irreconcilable differences with the people of his hometown.

Title: Los lunes al sol
Short Description: This is the story of those who live as if every day was a constant Sunday, those who spend their Mondays in the sun. The story of people who worked in a dockyard but are now unemployed.

Title: Dolls
Short Description: Three stories of never-ending love.

Title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
Short Description: Satyendra Mishra "Rajkumar Rao" and Aarti Shukla "Kriti Kharbanda" agree to get married arranged by their parents, after Satyendra Mishra get government job. Aarti Shukla, run away from their marriage. What life waits for them ahead?

Title: Whisper If I Forget
Short Description: An old pop singer who has Alzheimer's returns to her old house where she remembers her old days of climbing the stairs of fame and fortune while trying to deal with her older sister who holds her responsible for her ruined life.
On June 25, 1983, the Lord's Cricket Ground witnessed 14 men beat the two times World Champions West Indies, putting India back onto the cricket world stage.

Title: Taxi to the Dark Side
Short Description: Alex Gibney exposes the haunting details of the USA's torture and interrogation practices during the War in Afghanistan.

Title: Le huitième jour
Short Description: An unusual and wonderful friendship develops between a busy but unhappy salesman and a resident of a mental asylum.

Title: Horse Feathers
Short Description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, Huxley University's new president, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against their rival, Darwin University.

Title: Nannaku Prematho
Short Description: An intelligent son of a former entrepreneur takes revenge on a powerful and rich businessman who is as smart as he is.

Title: The Band's Visit
Short Description: A band comprised of members of the Egyptian police force head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town.

Title: Monsieur Lazhar
Short Description: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.

Title: Sex Mission
Short Description: Two scientists are placed into a 3-year hibernation, but when they wake up, it turns out to have been 50 years, and they are the only two males in a new underground society composed exclusively of women.

Title: Hichki
Short Description: Naina, who lives with Tourette Syndrome, gets assigned a class of defiant students and must ensure that her students realize their potential.

Title: Dhamaal
Short Description: Four lazy slacker conmen buddies learn about the secret of a hidden treasure from a dying thief and set out to find and claim it while being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hellbent to get the treasure all by himself.

Title: Snow White
Short Description: A twist on the Snow White fairy tale that is set in 1920s Seville and centered on a female bullfighter.

Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
Short Description: A story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart.

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Short Description: A Pakistani submarine, Ghazi plans to secretly attack Vizag port. For doing so, it has to get past Indian submarine S21.

Title: Metallica: Some Kind of Monster
Short Description: The iconic metal band struggles for two years to create their album St. Anger, dealing with alcoholism, the loss of their bass player, and the challenge of working with a psychotherapist.

Title: Vavien
Short Description: A reckless electrician, who is struggling with debt, decides to kill his wife and use her savings as a way out. His plan takes an unexpected twist when his loving wife, comes back from the dead to be with her family.

Title: The Son
Short Description: A joinery instructor at a rehab center refuses to take a new teen as his apprentice, but then begins to follow the boy through the hallways and streets.

Title: Fear City: A Family-Style Comedy
Short Description: A second-class horror movie has to be shown at Cannes Film Festival, but, before each screening, the projectionist is killed by a mysterious fellow, with hammer and sickle, just as it happens in the film to be shown.

Title: Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding
Short Description: A violent chain of events ensues as a jailed criminal arranges to buy a car from a shady car dealer, unaware that his partner in freedom has squandered most of the money from their last bank robbery on horse race betting.

Title: Sharmaji Namkeen
Short Description: A light-hearted coming-of-age story of a lovable 60-year-old-man.

Title: Dum Laga Ke Haisha
Short Description: Prem and his oversized wife Sandhya are supposed to spend a lifetime together. Will a regular arranged marriage turn out to be a perfect mismatch?

Title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
Short Description: Five key days in a family's life.

Title: Killing the Shadows
Short Description: A story about the tragedy and the danger of humor and the humorist - A comedy as grand as the Lands of Rome.

Title: Bigger Stronger Faster*
Short Description: An examination of America's win-at-all-cost culture from the perspective of bodybuilding and performance enhancing drugs, as it focuses on a pair of siblings chasing their dream.

Title: Lootcase
Short Description: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He takes the suitcase and soon finds himself being chased by a notorious gangster, an honest cop and a minister, who want the suitcase at any cost.

Title: Behzat Ç.: I Buried You in My Heart
Short Description: An agressive police officer tries to solve the mystery behind consecutive murders. While doing so, he must fight against his inner demons.

Title: Santa Claus Is a Stinker
Short Description: Two neurotics, working for a suicide hotline on the night of Christmas Eve, get caught up in a catastrophe when a pregnant woman, her abusive boyfriend, and a transvestite visit their office.

Title: Two Lottery Tickets
Short Description: Three men from a provincial town are in urgent need of money and decide to buy a lottery ticket. They win the lottery, but soon after their ticket gets stolen.

Title: Srimanthudu
Short Description: Harsha, a multi-millionaire's heir who has everything, still feels that there is something missing in his life. In an attempt to fill the void, he adopts a village to bring change in the people.

Title: Conclave
Short Description: When Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with leading one of the world's most secretive and ancient events, selecting a new Pope, he finds himself at the center of a web of conspiracies and intrigue that could shake the very foundation of the Catholic Church.

Title: Marco
Short Description: Gangster Marco and the powerful Adat family, who dominate Kerala's gold mafia.

Title: Dracula
Short Description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

Title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
Short Description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

Title: The Lighthouse
Short Description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

Title: John Wick
Short Description: John Wick is a former hitman grieving the loss of his true love. When his home is broken into, robbed, and his dog killed, he is forced to return to action to exact revenge.

Title: Scream
Short Description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

Title: Ready Player One
Short Description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

Title: The Nice Guys
Short Description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

Title: Spider-Man
Short Description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

Title: Oliver!
Short Description: After being sold to the mortician Sowerberry, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by their elderly mentor Fagin in 1830s London in this musical based on Charles Dickens' Oliver Twist.

Title: Me Before You
Short Description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

Title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
Short Description: Set in the small-town of Bareilly, Bitti is a free-spirited young girl who lives life on her own terms and refuses to be pressured into getting married. Her life takes a shift when she meets Chirag Dubey and Pritam Vidrohi.
